html.body:
Upgrade Your Digital MarCum Flasher For Free

Most flashers just get older with time. MarCum digital sonars get better. That’s because MarCum releases free firmware upgrades that make your digital sonar unit even better at finding fish than on the day you bought it.

Find Service Centers

New Lithium Lazer

24”Ice. 56 Holes. Incredibly Fast. All On A Single Charge

New Lithium Lazer

Auger Wars

See how StrikeMaster Stacks up against the competition!

4-Stroke Auger Wars Electric Auger Wars

Both the LX-6 and LX-7 have a “Multifaceted Sonar Display” that allows anglers to choose from multiple display options including water column vertical, vertical zoom, flasher dial and traditional horizontal graph. A user-defined on-screen "Dashboard” displays digital depth, battery voltage, range, gain, interference rejection (IR), target adjust, or any combination thereof. Both digital ice fishing sonar units boast razor-thin target separation and industry-exclusive Sonar Footprint technology, which displays scan area at any depth, with either 8°or 20°transducer cone angles. The LX-7 features an 8-inch, 800x600 pixel LCD display, with a target separation down to 1/2-inch. The LX-6 features a 6-inch, 640x480 pixel LCD display, with a target separation down to ¾-inch.

MarCum offers a variety of flasher ice systems to cover the gamut from professional to casual weekend warrior. For the absolute best in resolution and target separation, opt for the LX-5 which features a patented TrueColor® display and SuperFine Line technology for separation down to just ¾-inch. The VX-1P is a great choice for the casual angler – easy and intuitive to use, yet loaded with features not found in other “entry level” systems. All MarCum flashers come standard with interference rejection, rechargeable battery, battery charger and padded softpack.

The RT-9 features full GPS capability via Navionics Mapping, in a 9” ruggedized Android TouchScreen tablet. The modular concept allows users to build their own system, starting with Ice Sonar and adding Open Water and Camera modules as needed. The Sonar Module delivers the full feature set found in MarCum’s Digital Series systems. The Camera Module provides the sharpest underwater imaging and on-screen display of temperature, depth and direction. With multiple Sonar Modules, users can view multiple holes in one display. Get a fish finder with GPS and so much more with the MarCum RT-9 platform.
MarCum’s Auto Camera Panner works with any underwater camera and spans up to 16” to fit over all holes. With 5-8 hours of run time, you can stalk fish all day.
MarCum’s Auto Camera Panner works with any underwater camera and spans up to 16” to fit over all holes. With 5-8 hours of run time, you can stalk fish all day.

The Showdown Dual Beam is loaded with features, including a dual beam 8/20 transducer, interference rejection system, ½-inch target separation and infinite adjustable zoom and auto bottom lock zoom. The Showdown Troller 2.0 fits in your parka pocket yet has 4,000 watts of power, patented 10-level interference rejection (IR) system, 25-level sensitivity and auto bottom-lock zoom. The flashlight-sized LX-i is perfect for easy, one-handed depth reading through the ice. Highly powerful and highly portable—these are smart sonar indeed.
MarCum’s replacement transducer arm is universal and fits all flashers and digital series sonar. With a few clicks your replacement will be on its way and you’ll be back on the ice in no time.

With a panoramic 8-inch split-screen enabled LCD, you can play the interactive ice fishing game in sonar and live action modes, simultaneously. Another MarCum Technologies breakthrough, the LX-9 is the industry’s first sonar/underwater viewing system combo with an integrated digital video recorder (DVR). For the first time ever, anglers can compare sonar signals with live underwater video side-by-side, providing a “big picture” underwater analysis. Learn to read sonar like never before. Quickly distill pertinent structure, lure and fish details that yield potently effective fishing patterns. Plus, record what you see, upload your videos and let your hotspots go viral.

MarCum has a variety of underwater fishing cameras for every need and price point. For pro-grade features at a value price, opt for the vs485c. For the highest definition viewscreens and optics possible and a complete array of on-screen displays and adjustments, consider the VS825SD. For the ultimate in fish finding dominance, take a look at the LX-9 sonar/camera hybrid. Whichever underwater fishing camera you choose, rest assured you’re using superior technology that puts fish on the ice.

From up to 300 feet away you can remotely change camera direction, adjust lighting and even snap still images or record videos and instantly save them to your library. You can even network multiple cameras to one smart phone or tablet for incredible on the ice coverage. Available in two models, with or without the camera included, the MarCum PanCam Systems give you the freedom to move around the ice and still keep an eye on the action.

customer-group.group-id: Everyone Minus Employees ProStaff and VIPs

html.body: Testing Rapala Left Side Slot

Since 1936, anglers have been putting their trust in Rapala, and the company has delivered in spades. More world record fish have been caught with a Rapala lure than any other company. There’s a reason (several, actually) why Rapala is recognized as the world’s leading brand of fishing lures. Give us a try – we promise you’ll be glad you did.

Great for casting and trolling, the BX series lures have an irresistible swimming action with a rolling flash that drive fish wild. For cold or dark water or just plain old finicky fish, add a little kick to the “baitfish in distress” action with the BX jointed lures. They’ll tempt even the most uninterested fish into taking a bite. Truly one-of-a-kind pieces, the actions and the durability of the BX series lures are unmatched by any other bait on the market.

When fish are inactive and the strike zone is small, a lure that swims just a few feet above or below won’t get a second look. In these situations, you need to present your bait right in front of the fish, and this is where the DT series excels. Each of the six models are designed to hit a specific depth and stay there. Casts like a bullet and comes in several different body shapes, actions and colors to mimick a variety of forage shapes and patterns. Get down to business with the DT series.

There’s something about eating your catch just minutes after you pulled it out of the water. For quick and easy preparation in the field, or for any time you just don’t want the wires in the way, choose a cordless electric fillet knife. Rapala offers a Deluxe Cordless Fillet Knife Set with 2 different sized reciprocating blades and a Lithium Ion Cordless Fillet Knife, with an impressive 80 minute runtime and no reduction in power or speed even as the battery power wains.

Rapala also offers a variety of electric fillet knives with power cords, including the Deluxe Set with various power adapters and 2 blade sizes, and a Heavy Duty Electric Fillet Knife with increased speed and power for large fish. Get your catch to the frying pan faster with Rapala’s collection of electric fillet knives.

We’ve got fish grippers, scales, rulers, pliers and more to help you fill the gaps in your fishing gear. Never guesstimate the size and weight, struggle to remove a hook or lose a catch overboard again!

There are 3 key ingredients that make Ike’s Custom Ink Lures a totally fresh and unique presentation. First is the muted, sun-faded look. Ike used to bake his baits on the dash of his car for months to achieve this coloring, which he says more closely matches reality. Second is the pearl finish, which again, is a better match to most baitfish, particularly shad. Ike used to buy pearlized nail polish from the salon to get this finish on his baits. The final touch is glitter. Ike prefers a super-fine glitter that adds depth and just the right reflective properties to mimic real baitfish. When he was doing this on his own, it required a trip to the hobby store to find the right glitter.

You don’t need to cook your lures, go to the salon or hit up the hobby shop to get these fish magnets. With Ike’s Custom Ink Lures, you get all that knowledge and artistry right-out-of-the-box. Add to that the legendary Rapala swimming action and you can see why this collection is favored by anglers and large fish alike.

Each lure is constructed of super tough African Abachi wood and features the classic Rapala “wounded minnow” swimming action. Hand-tuned and tank tested, these lures will swim true at any speed, cast or trolled. Not just a saltwater fish slayer, Magnums are equally effective at landing trophy pike, striped bass and musky. Available in a variety of sizes and patterns to match every fishing scenario. More World Record fish have been caught with these Rapalas than any other lure. Magnums® are truly "Your Best Shot At A World Record."

The wounded minnow action of this lure is guaranteed to catch fish. The Rapala Original Floater, often called the Original Floater, comes in a variety of colors and sizes to cover any angling situation and to target different species from panfish to bass, from trout to musky. See for yourself why the Original Floating(R) is acclaimed by anglers as the most versatile lure worldwide.

With fishing, a lot of it comes down to luck, but a lot comes down to the right tackle. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for spring bass fishing. Try these and you’ll be catching fish faster than you can say “spring fever”.

With a little extra time and attention, summer bass fishing can be as productive as other seasons. The key is the right tackle. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for summer bass fishing. From poppers, to spinnerbaits to plastics, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

But even with these obliging fish, finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for panfish. From ultralight crankbaits to spoons and plastics, we’ve got the best tackle to help you load up your stringer with panfish.

Walleye can be finicky and have a reputation for being short strikers, so using the right lure and presentation are key. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for walleye. From the right line to crankbaits, spinnerbaits and jigs, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

Considered by many to be the best running hardbait, the Shad Rap can help locate fish wherever they are, from top to bottom, and is an ideal choice for when you want to work a lot of water quickly. The family includes a Shallow Shad Rap perfect for skinny water, the Glass Shad Rap with a see-through glass body that adapts to the conditions, the Shad Rap RS with a different action that suspends on the stall like a real baitfish and the Super Shad for landing larger fish like pike and musky. The Shad Rap and its family give anglers the right tools to go into any fishing situation with the utmost confidence. Add Jointed Shad Rap and Jointed Shallow Shad Rap.

The Tail Dancer family of lures allows you to cover the entire water column, from the shallows to the depths. The original Tail Dancer lure is ideal for depths up to 15 feet and features VMC black nickel treble hooks to hold fish and withstand intense battles. For depths up to 30 feet, choose the Deep Tail Dancer. The enlarged, extreme diving lip sinks the lure as deep as 30 feet unassisted, getting this bait down where the big ones lie during the mid-summer and early fall months. Early spring or late fall, shallow or deep running, the Tail Dancer weaves an irresistible dance for all species of fish.

The Ultra Light series includes a variety of body styles to match a variety of situations. The Ultra Light Rippin’ Rap has a lipless, deep belly profile designed to crank, swim and rip. Perfect for pulling over or through grass, bouncing off timber and rippin’ through rocks. The Ultra Light Minnow is the classic “wounded minnow Rapala action” in a miniature version.. Designed to work at a running depth of 2-3 feet and great for panfish and trout. For a smaller take on the most prolific baitfish, choose the Ultra Light Shad. The Ultra Light Crank can dive up to 8 feet, works with the traditional crankbait retrieve and easily backs out of cover when paused. Difficult fish? Skinny water? Ultra Light aficionado? Rapala’s Ultra Light series of lures have you covered.

slot-configuration.description: Rapala Best Selling Ice Fishing Gear

html.body: Our Best Selling Ice Fishing Gear includes all the necessities for hardwater fishing from Rapala and our respected ice fishing brands including MarCum, StrikeMaster, and Ice Force. Sonar, augers, sleds and gloves can be found here. Lots of smaller items too, like batteries, bait pucks, line and jigs. All time tested and angler approved to help you catch more fish.

When the thermometer dips below zero, the 3M Thinsulate® insulation in our Ice Force Insulated bib will lock in warmth. Additional padding in the knees provides comfort when kneeling and reeling. The StrikeMaster Polar Bibs feature heavy-duty 300-denier nylon and will provide years of protection and functionality at a great price. Ladies cut ice fishing bibs are available as well. Keep the cold out, lock the heat in and stay on the ice longer in a pair of Rapala ice fishing bibs.

The Clackin’ series works all season from early spring to late fall, and is ideal for dark water situations. The series includes the Clackin’ Rap with a lipless design to allow for a variety of fishing styles, the Clackin’ Minnow with classic “wounded minnow” action, the Clackin’ Crank with square lip for deflection off underwater structures, and the Clackin’ Magnum for saltwater. As if the Clackin’ rattle wasn’t enough, each lure includes an internal holographic foil and 3D holographic eye for a complete sensory experience that fish can’t resist. Rapala’s Clackin’ series is a sound choice for multi-species action.

If biting wind and cold is what you’re blocking against, protect your face and neck with a Rapala ice gaiter. Better than a scarf, this handy item can be worn around the neck or pulled up to cover chin, mouth and nose for extra coverage in extreme cold. Stretch fabric holds the gaiter in place.

Whether for cold/wind or heat/sun, Rapala gaiters are made of weather-resistant material. Rapala sun gaiters are made with 3M CoolMax® Extreme fabric, which moves sweat from the body through the fabric to the outside where it can evaporate quickly, helping to reduce skin temperature. Rapala sun gaiters also protect sensitive neck and face skin from sunburn, crucial for anglers spending hours on the water in the sun. Rapala ice gaiters are made of silky 3M ThermoLite® fabric for total comfort—no scratchy wool or pilled fleece to irritate your skin. 18” size ensures complete coverage, neck-to-nose.

The 29” version of the Original Floating® lure is packaged in the classic Rapala box with legend story on the back. If you really want to get the fish tales going, opt for the 6 foot giant lure. This whopper features the Rapala logo on one side and real metal hooks. The dimensions are 6’x19” and 18 pounds—surely smaller than your greatest catch, right?

Ice Force fishing gloves provide comfort and warmth without any loss of dexterity – a must for anglers. 3M Thinsulate® insulation ensures hands stay toasty and a Sure-Grip coating on palms and fingers keep fish securely in place while handling. For superior protection from extreme cold, opt for Ice Force Heavy Weight gloves. These gloves are windproof, water repellant and feature extra-long cuffs with elastic wrist and cuff drawstring to keep out the wind and snow.

All hats are premium quality and come in a variety of styles. Mesh back, distressed, visor, flex fit flat brim or beanie for the colder weather. We even have a Rapala LED cap for more productive night fishing. Some feature a low-profile, shorter depth bill perfect for wearing with a hoodie or parka. Others have a standard brim size for more sun protection. Tell everyone that Rapala is head and shoulders above the rest with a Rapala hat

The family includes the Down Deep Husky Jerk, which reaches depths of 20 feet when trolled and will run up to 10 feet deep when cast and retrieved; and the Jointed Deep Husky Jerk, with the classic Rapala "wounded-minnow" wobble and an exaggerated tail action that fish can't refuse. All include an internal rattle for added attraction and come in metallic, natural and glass patterns to cover all fishing conditions.

Catching big trout and kokanee takes a little know-how. And finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for trout and kokanee. From lake trolls to spoons and crankbaits, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

Catching these monsters is no easy task, though. Notoriously difficult, the muskie has been called “the fish of ten thousand casts”. And finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for muskie and pike. From spinnerbaits to a variety of shad and minnow lures, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

Scatter Rap’s patented Scatter Lip™ is the secret to the evasive movement that draws strikes like no other lure out there. Every Scatter Lip is specifically designed to match the size, shape and profile of the bait for maximum action. This, combined with a wide variety of body shapes and colors makes the Scatter Rap series a must-have lure in every angler’s tackle box.

The Skitter Walk family includes freshwater and saltwater options. All feature internal scale and gill patterns, realistic 3D holographic eyes and your choice of appetizing painted or chrome colors. The Saltwater Skitter Walks are equipped with VMC® Perma Steel® hooks and rugged, saltwater hardware. As with all Rapala lures, superior construction ensures a perfect swimming bait right-out-of-the-box. Get your rest, cause you’ll be picking ‘em off the top all day with the Skitter Walk series!

For early fall or late spring when there’s just a slight chill in the air, choose the lighter weight Rapala Jersey Knit Hoodie or Rapala Lures Burnout Hoodie. For a unique look, go for the Realtree Camo hooded sweatshirt. If you’re planning on working up a sweat reeling in lunkers, opt for our Performance sweatshirts with technical fabric to wick moisture away but lock warmth in. Looking for a traditional, heavyweight hoodie? We’ve got those too – in several colors and styles.

Rapala’s X-Rap® series lures are the ultimate in versatility. Years of development led to a lure that can be fished any season, anywhere, for any fish. Its unique technology allows the angler to change the swimming action simply by speeding up or slowing down the retrieve. Fish it aggressively for the hard cutting, side-to-side Slashbait® action or slow it down for the classic Rapala roll. The X-Rap is built with a long cast weight transfer system for super-human casts and is loaded with features from tip to tail, including internal holographic foil, 3D holographic eyes, flash foil teaser tails, and premium VMC® black nickel hooks. The X-Rap series also offers a variety of lifelike colors to match any situation or location. Freshwater or saltwater, early spring or late fall, shallow or deep—the X-Rap can do it all. Once you tie an X-Rap lure on, you won’t take it off for the rest of the season.

Our New Arrivals category features all of our hottest new items. Here’s where you’ll find new lures, new actions, new sizes, new colors, new finishes, new tools, new accessories and new ways of catching more fish. Get the latest ice fishing accessories, fillet boards and clothing too.
MarCum’s replacement transducer arm is universal and fits all flashers and digital series sonar. With a few clicks your replacement will be on its way and you’ll be back on the ice in no time.

MarCum has a variety of underwater fishing cameras for every need and price point. For pro-grade features at a value price, opt for the vs485c. For the highest definition viewscreens and optics possible and a complete array of on-screen displays and adjustments, consider the VS825SD. For the ultimate in fish finding dominance, take a look at the LX-9 sonar/camera hybrid. Whichever underwater fishing camera you choose, rest assured you’re using superior technology that puts fish on the ice.
testing 123

If you’re looking for something to tie on the end of your line, browse our selection of top selling lures, spoons and spinners. For filleting, check out our top selling knives and fillet boards. If gear is what you’re after, we have an extensive list of best sellers for both open water and hardwater.

Our Best Selling Open Water Gear includes all the necessities for fall, spring and summer fishing. Lures, line, leaders, hooks, weights, jigs and more can all be found here. Lots of tools too, like scales, rulers, pliers and scissors. All time tested and angler approved to help you catch more fish.

slot-configuration.description: : Best Selling Lures, Spoons and SpinnersRapala

html.body: What’s on the list? More than we can detail here, but some standouts include the Rapala Original Floating lure, Terminator T-1 Titanium Spinnerbait, Rapala Scatter Rap Minnow, Rapala Shad Rap, VMC Flash Champ Spoon and Rapala Down Deep Husky Jerk. You can’t go wrong adding any of these best sellers to your collection, and you’ll soon join the ranks of anglers who wondered how they ever did without them.

We’ve got t-shirts, long sleeve shirts, hoodies and jackets. Heavy-weight, light-weight, and performance fabric. Distressed hats, mesh-back hats, flat brim hats, and visors. We’ve got red, white, black, gray, camo and more. Mens, Women’s and Youth. We know that variety is important—we make lures for a living!

As for serious outerwear, we carry several parkas and jackets, polar bibs, and heavy weight gloves and ice gaiters. Each is designed for the angler and loaded with functional features to make your time on the ice comfortable and productive.

There’s something about eating your catch just minutes after you pulled it out of the water. For quick and easy preparation in the field, or for any time you just don’t want the wires in the way, choose a cordless electric fillet knife. Rapala offers a Deluxe Cordless Fillet Knife Set with 2 different sized reciprocating blades and a Lithium Ion Cordless Fillet Knife, with an impressive 80 minute runtime and no reduction in power or speed even as the battery power wains.

Rapala also offers a variety of electric fillet knives with power cords, including the Deluxe Set with various power adapters and 2 blade sizes, and a Heavy Duty Electric Fillet Knife with increased speed and power for large fish. Get your catch to the frying pan faster with Rapala’s collection of electric fillet knives.

The Tournament Ruler is perfect for the pros, with tournament-approved accuracy, easy-to-read numbers and 60” size that folds for storage. The 60” and 24” Folding Rulers include a fold-up end wall tohold fish against for extreme accuracy and mounting holes for permanent installation. Our 36” Adhesive Ruler sticks to any hard surface, for quick, accurate measuring. Rule out any suggestions that your catch was just a “fish tale” with a Rapala ruler.

Rapala has a variety of thoughtfully designed pliers and forceps, chock full of handy features. Easily reach deep hooked baits and other hard to reach hooks with the 11” Long Reach Pliers or 6-1/2” Fisherman’s Pliers. Our Panfish Pliers and 5” Mini Curved Pliers provide excellent control and reach for work with crappies, sunfish and just about anything small. Our 6-1/2” Aluminum Pliers are loaded with features, yet are super lightweight. And those are just some of our offerings. Most pliers are spring-loaded for easy one-handed use and come with split shot crimper, side cutter and split ring or lure tuning tool. And don’t forget the classic Fishing Forceps—a must-have for removing hooks, rigging and knot-tying.

Choose from classic Rapala logo decals, slogan decals, and bass, walleye or pike/musky silhouettes. Or get decals for any of our respected brands, including: StrikeMaster, Ice Force, Blue Fox, Luhr Jensen, MarCum, Trigger X, Storm, Williamson, Terminator, VMC, and Sufix.

Rapala has an extensive catalog, so you can find a great fishing gift for any budget. To make it easy, we’ve grouped our most popular gift items by price so you can shop for items under $50, under $100 or under $200. Searching for fishing gifts for the Christmas stocking? Take a look at our Stocking Stuffers category for lures and gear that’ll make your angler’s Christmas very merry. Rapala is a gift that truly keeps on giving season, after season, after season.

We have a variety of gifts $100 and Up. For the beginning angler, the Rapala Pro Angler Kit is the perfect gift, complete with the most-used tools of the trade. For the curator of fine knives on your list, take a look at our Marttiini Collector’s Series of fillet knives. Our Sportman’s Rod Case and Glide-Lite Sled are also great options. Whatever the angler on your list is into, you’ll find the perfect gift at Rapala.

Shop from our wide array of fishing items like our most popular lures, must-have gear, can’t-live-without tools and clothing. Whatever the angler on your list is into, you’ll find the perfect gift at Rapala.

Check out a wide variety of gifts from tools to giant lures. We know how hard it is to find just the right gift, so we made this list to help you out. With options for every type of angler, you will find the perfect gift here.

We have a wide variety of fishing gifts under $25 to choose from, from lures to tools, to clothing. You can go with a combo gift, like an Original Floating lure, some Super Line Scissors and a Bass Decal; or one larger item like a Rapala hoodie. Whatever you choose, a Rapala gift is one that keeps on giving.

Who are the Rapala Pros? Our Pro Staff is a dream team of fishing’s best, with seasoned pros of more than 30 years alongside new up-and-comers. The Pro Staff includes Ott DeFoe, Davy Hite, Mike Iaconelli, Brandon Palaniuk, Bernie Schultz, Terry Bolton, Dave Lefebre, Jacob Wheeler, Chris Gilman, Mike Gofron, Perry Good, Mark Martin, Mark Fisher, Tom Neustrom, Troy Lindner, and Brad Leifermann. For more detailed bios, visit our Pro Staff page.

To pull in that kind of a haul, you need the right tackle. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for fall bass fishing. From spinners to crankbaits to plastics, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land bass all day.

Upgrade your comfort factor with flip-up bench seats, cushioned swivel seats, or our cross-linked seat rail. Fix tears with large or small fish house patches and get extra wind support during extreme weather with the Adjustable Front Wind Pole. Get organized with the Sportman’s Caddy Center Console and free your hands with our rod holder. Then cover everything up with our waterproof travel covers and ride through slush, mud and water worry-free.

The Pro XT1200 is the ice shelter for fanatical anglers who demand it all. Fully insulated, with an exclusive cross-link seating system with multi-directional swivel buckets seats and loads of other smart features, the Pro XT1200 is the ultimate in comfort and safety. The XT650 includes a dual-layer thermal top and flip-up bench seating system. Both come in 1-man, 2-man and 3-man sizes. Otter—the toughest fish house on the market and the choice of seasoned ice vets.

The Pro XT1200 has a fully sewn and quilted thermal 1200 denier shell with high loft for maximum insulation and reduction of condensation. It features an exclusive cross-link seating system with multi-directional deluxe padded swivel bucket seats for all-day comfort. An oversized square tube frame with anodized receiver tubes and the frame’s ultra-glide system is the cornerstone of Otter’s toughness. Available in 1-man, 2-man, 2-3 man and 3-man sizes.

The XT650 boasts a fully sewn and quilted thermal-top, dual-layer 650 denier shell to greatly minimize heat loss and reduce condensation. Sets up easily with oversized square tube aluminum frame with anodized receiver tubes and ultra-glide system, plus a custom trim-lock system that attaches the house to the sled in just 30 seconds. Features a foam-padded flip-up bench seat that provides all day comfort and easy access to storage. Available in 1-man, 2-man and 3-man sizes.

This simple, yet essential steel bracket mounts to the wall with two screws. Just slide the auger into the Auger Shield, then hang the lip of the shield onto the mount and you’re done. The auger stays protected in the shield and your garage or shed floor stays clear of clutter.

Protect your two most important ice fishing tools with an Otter accessory and you know they’ll be safe and sound for years to come. Our Auger Shield will keep your ice auger protected from bumpy sled rides, and coupled with the Auger Mount, it can be hung out of harm’s way when not in use. Our Sportman’s Rod Case will keep up to 6 rod combos from being damaged in transport.

Otter’s Auger Shield is made of full length, roto-molded polyethylene for unbeatable toughness. 43.5” in length and available in two sizes to fit 8” and 10” augers, the shield is a simple and effective accessory. No instructions, no assembly – just slide it onto the auger, place it in the sled and get on your way. Keep everything in your house safe with an Otter Auger Shield.

Each Pro Sled is a one-piece polyethylene construction with seamless surfaces and uniform thickness. A reinforced outer lip provides strength and support and a raised back ensures cargo security. Designed with the optimum attack angle for overcoming snow, slush and rugged terrain. The Pro Sled is available in a variety of sizes depending on your needs, from the Mini at just 8 pounds and 43”L X 23”W X 10.5”H to the Large at 64 pounds and 85”L X 44”W X 17”H.

Otter ice fishing sled accessories include must-haves like Tow Hitch Pins and Travel Covers. You’ll also find smart ideas like the Hitch Pivot which allows the hitch to fold up over the sled for transport and the Flipper Hitch Adapter which allows the tow hitch to be attached without needing to change out the traditional ball hitch. Use the Tow Hitch Adapter to attach the tow hitch to the Otter Pro Mini Sled or to convert Sports Sleds for towing. Tow two sleds in tandem with the Rear Sled Hitch Receiver with Pin and add the Hyfax Runner Kit to your sled for extreme durability and high mileage.

Choose from Otter’s three premium sleds. The Medium Wild Sled is a great setup for early season ice or working smaller lakes and bays. The Sport Sled is a lighter weight version of the Otter Pro Sled, best suited for hand pulling. The Otter Pro Sled is the one that started it all and your go-to for serious ice fishing outings. At Otter, it’s not just another sled, it’s our reputation!

Like all Otter products, the Sportsman’s Rod Case is 100% rugged roto-molded polyethylene. Roto molding provides the best distribution of the material ensuring an even thickness throughout and no weak spots. Indestructible, yet lightweight, the case is foam lined and big enough to protect up to 6 rod combos.

In addition to the classic Countdown, the series includes the Scatter Rap Countdown, with the patented Scatter Lip design for an evasive, erratic action that mimics baitfish on the run; and the X-Rap Countdown, X-Rap style construction with a strong rolling action on the retrieve and flutter on the pause. For saltwater and larger fish, there’s also the Countdown Magnum. With the Rapala Countdown series, catching fish is as easy as 1-2-3.

All of our fillet boards feature either FDA approved hardwood or FDA & USADA approved HDPE food-grade plastic. Many include a clamp to hold fish in place. Other ingenious features include a juice groove to keep liquids from spilling off the edges, routed bottoms to fit securely over 4,5 & 6 gallon buckets and a folding fillet board for compact storage and transport.

And if, like many anglers, you enjoy cooking your fish almost as much as you enjoyed catching it, Rapala’s kitchen knife collection has all the tools for the job. Having a variety of knives in the kitchen is as important as having a variety of lures in your tacklebox. This high quality collection from Marttiini includes everything from a classic cook’s knife to a bread knife, vegetable knife and carving knife.

For those who enjoy hunting when they’re not fishing or have friends or family that love to hunt, Marttiini Collector’s Hunting Knives are a beautiful addition to anyone’s knife collection. Equal parts function and art, each knife features a razor sharp blade, a curly birch handle and beautiful design. Each has its own special details like an engraved blade, detailed leather sheath or a sculpture adorning the end of the handle and comes in a wooden, heirloom gift box.

The secret to our success is the unmistakable, irresistible “wounded minnow” swimming action of our lures. Now matter how you fish them—slow or fast, shallow or deep—our lures draw strikes like no others. Even the most negative fish can be tempted with a Rapala. Many have tried, but none have been able to imitate that classic Rapala action. This is partly because Rapala is still the only company in the world that mass produces fishing lures made of balsa wood. It’s a more difficult process, but crucial to achieving the swimming action that drives fish wild. No shortcuts. No gimmicks. No flash in the pan next greatest things. Just a legacy of quality that shines in every lure as brightly as the internal holographic foil and black nickel hooks.

Rapala’s Jigging Rap Series includes the Jigging Rap and the Jigging Shad Rap. Both feature a precision balanced design and single reversed hooks with center treble and eyelet. The Jigging Rap has a minnow profile and the Jigging Shad Rap’s shad profile has a more pronounced movement, with slow circle down action. Both are available and natural and glow color patterns and a variety of sizes. With Rapala’s Jigging Series you’ll be whackin’ fish in both winter and summer!

Otter’s Tow Hitch Pins are designed to work exclusively with the Otter Sled Tow Hitch. The Universal Tow Hitch Pin connects all Otter Hitch sizes to an ORV, ATV or snowmobile and can also be used to connect another hitch to the Rear Sled Receiver Hitch for towing two sleds in line.

The Wind Pole features “C” clips on both ends for mounting in any orientation, and attaches easily to the shelter. The aluminum pole adjusts from 43” to 80”. Don’t let a strong wind shake your shelter or your confidence—snap on Otter’s wind pole and keep on fishing.

The Flipper Hitch Adapter allows the Otter Sled Tow Hitch (models 200086, 200085 and 200084) to be attached to any ATV or UTV. The genius in this hitch is that it can be mounted onto the existing ball mount receiver, enabling you to use the Flipper Hitch or traditional ball with no changeout. Fits hitch ball mounts up to 2-5/8” wide.

The Hitch Pivot simply folds up and over on top of your sled when not in use. When attached, it works just like a standard rigid hitch. Just pull out three quick-connect pins, fold the hitch pivot and you’re done. When you’re ready to hook the sled up again, fold the hitch pivot out, connect the three pins and you’re off and running.

Made Otter tough, this hitch is designed for pulling heavy weight. It includes a steel Backer Plate with hardware to evenly distribute the weight being pulled and reduce stress on the sled and a Hitch Receiver with Hitch Pin. Tow all of your gear and your friend’s gear too, with Otter’s Rear Sled Hitch Receiver.

Otter has a variety of seating options to choose from. The Cushioned Seat/Bracket features an adjustable metal bracket that supports a super comfortable cushioned seat with folding backrest and 360 degree swivel motion. For Otter Pro Small to Large Sleds. The Cushioned Seat with Base and Brackets is designed to fit Otter Pro Package Seat Rails. Cross-Link Seating Rail required. The Flip-Up Cushioned Bench Seat has dense foam padding and flips up for easy access to gear stowed beneath. Padded backrest folds forward for travel.

The sled features a raised back and dropped sidewalls for easier access to gear. The Hyfax runners are made of 5/8” high-density plastic and bolt into the molded-in pockets on the bottom of any Otter. Perfect for the high miler who needs extreme durability. The tow hitch is the strongest on the market and includes a pivoting, spring-loaded coupler that absorbs shock. The sled cover is durable and waterproof and fits tightly to block out snow, slush and water.

Hyfax runners are 5/8” high density plastic, made to stand up to the impact of ice, rocks and pavement. They bolt into the molded-in pockets on the bottom of any Otter sled and come in several sizes to fit all Otter models.

The Sport Sled comes with a reinforced lip for strength and support, plus a raised back to keep cargo secure. A tow-rope is included for hand-pulling. If you’d rather tow the sled with a hitch, a Universal Tow Hitch Adapter can be easily mounted. The Sport Sled is available in three sizes: Small (43”L x 21”W x 9” H, 6 lbs.), Medium (53”L x 25” W x 10”H, 12.5 lbs.) and Large (64”L x 29”W x 11”H, 17 lbs.).

The Sportsman’s Caddy Center Console is generously sized and includes an insert tray for lures and more, plus room below for other necessities. Just like the sled it sits in, the Caddy is constructed of rugged polyethylene so that it will stand up to the elements. Dimensions are 20”Lx10”Wx10”D.

Otter’s Tow Hitch Pins are designed to work exclusively with the Otter Sled Tow Hitch. The Universal Tow Hitch Pin connects all Otter Hitch sizes to an ORV, ATV or snowmobile and can also be used to connect another hitch to the Rear Sled Receiver Hitch for towing two sleds in line.

Otter’s travel covers are manufactured from waterproof, super durable heavyweight fabric. A built-in shock cord within the hem holds the cover tight against the sled to block out snow, slush, water and mud. Roomy enough to fit the sled packed with basic gear. Choose from the Sport Sled Travel Cover and Pro & Wild Sled Travel covers, each with a variety of sizes to fit your specific sled.

The Universal Tow Hitch Adapter is ideal for converting Otter Sports Sleds as well as most other makes and models of cargo sled. The kit includes 2 hitch brackets, 2 backing plates and the required hardware.

The XT Series House Travel Cover is made of heavyweight fabric that is highly durable and waterproof. An integrated shock cord pulls the travel cover tight against the sled and seals out snow, slush, water and mud. Made to fit an Otter sled filled with basic gear. Available in 4 different sizes to fit Cottage, Cabin, Lodge and Resort sleds.

html.body: Otter’s Fish House Patches are available in two sizes – large and small. The large patch measures 18”x20” and is black fabric with Tear Mender adhesive. The small fish house patch is 5-3/4”x3” and is clear peel and stick.

The LX Series Dual Beam Transducer Kit works with all LX sonar models and comes with transom or trolling motor mounted capability. For VX series sonar systems, you can choose between the High Speed Transom Mount or Trolling Motor Mount 20 Degree Transducer Kits. When the water heats up, don’t put your MarCum on ice—put it to work on the open water with a transducer kit.

The Ice Sonar Module delivers the full feature set found in MarCum’s Digital Series systems. Multi-dimensional selectable views include traditional flasher, vertical or chart. The 8/20 degree Open Water transducer/temperature and Sonar Module allows connectivity to your RT-9 GPS for open water location, depth and water temp. The Camera Module provides the sharpest underwater imaging and on-screen display of temperature, depth and direction. Includes camera panner. With multiple Sonar Modules, users can view multiple holes in one display. The RT-9 can simulcast sonar or camera signals from 3 locations. Get a fish finder with GPS and so much more with the MarCum RT-9 platform.
Snow shields are custom fitted for your specific sonar. MarCum manufactures snow shields for the following systems: flashers, LX-7/LX-9, and LX-6.

The Cross-Linked Seat Rail not only makes it possible to add a cushioned seat, but also acts as a stabilizer to add additional rigidity when towing. Comfort and better performance? You bet. Comes in 3 different sizes to fit the Pro Cottage Sled, Pro Cabin Sled and Pro Lodge Sled.
The Otter Rod Holder is made of powder coated steel and mounts in Otter shelters and most portables. Comes with a 1 year warranty.

Check out the Rapala Vintage short sleeve t-shirt, in Rapala red with an “old school” logo or the Evasive Action t-shirt featuring the newest lure sensation, the Scatter Rap. Lady anglers can proclaim their allegiance to the brand with the “Rapala Ladies Love Rattlin’” tee. Get your future fishing partner started off right with the “Rapala Pro Staff In Training” T-shirt made specially for kids. And when the temperature starts to dip, cover up with a Rapala long-sleeve shirt.

You’ll find everything you need here: blades and guards for both hand and power ice augers, as well as a wide variety of accessories. Just some of the hand ice auger parts include an adjustable extension, in-line handle and knob assembly. For your power ice auger, you’ll find batteries, oil, spark plugs, storage cases and much more. Everything you need to get your StrikeMaster tuned up and ready to do battle with the ice.

Walleye can be finicky and have a reputation for being short strikers, so using the right lure and presentation are key. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for walleye. From the right line to crankbaits, spinnerbaits and jigs, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.
The Bucket Tray Cover fits most 5-6 gallon buckets. It can be used as a seat or reversed and used as a handy accessory tray.

StrikeMaster offers both a plastic and metal ice skimmer. The plastic skimmer comes in two sizes: Model SK-1 with a 12” plastic handle and 5-1/2” plastic cup and Model SK-2 with a 20” plastic handle and 5-3/8” plastic cup. The metal skimmer is constructed of aluminum, with a 20” handle printed with a standard ruler.

Sufix Performance Ice Braid sinks quickly to get your lure to your desired depth in no time. The line is small, smooth and round, so more fits on your reel and is super sensitive so you can feel every vibration, even from the lightest nibbles. Low stretch means instantaneous, sure hooksets. Performance Ice Braid is available in Glacier Blue and Neon Fire and in 4, 6, 8, 10, 20 and 30 pound test.

Castable Invisiline is low stretch for fast, sure hooksets. It also sinks fast—4 times faster than traditional nylon lines—so you can get into the strike zone more quickly. Exclusive G2 Winding virtually eliminates line memory for improved casting. This line is incredibly sensitive as well, so you can easily detect even the lightest nibbles. Available in 100 and 200 yard spools, ranging from 3 lb. test to 20 lb.test.

Sufix 832 lead core dives 30% deeper than traditional Dacron/polyester lead core lines. That means less line needs to be deployed to get into the strike zone than with traditional lead core. The 832 Advanced Lead Core is also 70% stronger than traditional lead core, with three times the abrasion resistance. Dyneema has infinitely more sensitivity than polyester so you can feel obstructions and bottom much better. The combination of materials also provides greater resistance to UV rays and sunlight. Sufix 832 Advanced Lead Core—always use the best line.

The thin diameter of 832 Advanced Ice Braid allows it to sink faster and be less visible to line-shy fish. The Dyneema and Gore fibers used in the braid’s construction shed water like duck feathers, and resist fraying and abrasions. All of this comes with a sensitivity that mono can’t match, for lightning fast hooksets on fish you might have missed with other line.

Sufix 832 Advanced Superline features a patent pending construction of 8 fibers (7 Dyneema and 1 Gore Performance Fiber) and 32 weaves (pics) per inch. It takes 12 hours to braid each 150 yard spool. The result of all that time? A super strong line that casts like a bullet, resists abrasions, repels water and yet remains highly sensitive. 832 Advanced Superline is available in a variety of colors including Camo, Ghost, Hi-Vis Yellow, Low-Vis Green and Neon Lime. Ranges from 6 pound test up to 80 pound test.

Sufix has a variety of braided fishing line to choose from. 832 Advanced Superline is the first true innovation in fishing line in two decades. Proprietary technologies make it the strongest, most durable small diameter braid on the market. Our Performance Braid is the longest casting, easiest handling braided fishing line available, and comes in a metered line as well for precise depth management. If ice fishing is your sport of choice, Sufix offers 832 Advanced Ice Braid, Performance Ice Braid and Performance Ice Fuse, a thermally fused line of 100% HMPE Dyneema for reduced freezing and virtually zero stretch.

100% Fluorocarbon Invisiline Leaders feature the same characteristics as all Sufix premium line—high tensile and knot strength and superior abrasion resistance. Unbelievable shock absorption handles powerful strikes and thrashing fish with ease. These leaders are also impervious to damaging ultraviolet rays, which can really take a toll over time. Available in 2 lb. test up to 150 lb. test.

Sufix Elite monofilament is known for its all-around exceptional performance. The precision, stacked winding of the G2 winding process plus large arbor spool virtually eliminates line memory for smooth, straight casts. When the fishing situation requires mono, Sufix Elite is a natural choice. Available in Clear, Lo-Vis Green, Hi-Vis Yellow and Camo. 330 yard spools ranging from 4 to 30 pound test. 15 and 30 lb test only available in 250 yards.

Sufix fluorocarbon fishing line is super strong and abrasion resistant, with incredible sensitivity. It has a low-stretch index for optimal hook setting power. The precision, stacked winding plus large arbor spool that our exclusive G2 Wining Process employs virtually eliminate line memory. Sufix fluorocarbon offerings include: Castable Invisiline 100% Fluorocarbon, 100% Fluorcarbon Invisiline Leaders, Invisiline Ice Fluorcarbon (water repellant), and Wind-On 100% Fluorocarbon Leader (with braided loop for attaching to main line without knots or swivels).

This isn’t your father’s ice line. Not long ago there weren’t any fishing lines made specifically for hardwater. The same mono you used in open water was expected to perform on the ice, and you ended up with stiff, unruly line. Ice Magic handles beautifully in the cold and in addition to its hydrophobic properties, it sinks fast for a more natural presentation. Available in Clear and Neon Orange, for times when you need a hi-vis line. Choose from 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8 lb. test.

Like all Sufix premium line, Invisiline Ice Fluorocarbon has unmatched strength, abrasion resistance and sensitivity. The low stretch index of this line allows for strong, fast hook sets. It sinks 4 times faster than monofilament, getting your presentation into the strike zone without delay. Get into stealth mode with Sufix Invisiline Ice Fluorocarbon. Available in 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 lb. test.

The superior abrasion resistance of Key Lime IGFA-Rated mono means that this line can stand up to the hours long battles that big game fish are known for. High knot strength keeps that huge tuna hooked up even during an epic battle and great shock absorption handles the thrashes and sudden bursts. Neon Lime color for visibility. Available in 20, 30, 50, 80 and 130 pound test.

Sufix 832® Advanced Lead Core is the most technologically advanced lead core on the market. It’s the first to combine both Dyneema® and Gore® performance fibers wrapped around a high density lead core. It dives 30% deeper and is 70% stronger than traditional lead core, and infinitely more sensitive. Available in 12 and 18 pound test and 100 or 200 yard spools. Our Performance Lead Core features the HTP (High Tenacity Polyester) braid, which increases break strength and abrasion resistance while adding density for faster sinking speeds. Available in 12, 15, 18, 27 and 36 pound test on a 100 yard spool.

Sufix 100% Fluorocarbon Invisiline Leaders are crystal clear, with amazing shock absorption, high tensile/knot strength and superior abrasion resistance. Wind-On version attaches quickly and easily to the main line without knots or swivels. Sufix Superior monofilament fishing leaders are super strong and rank among the highest in tensile strength. Wind-On Premium Monofilament Leaders attach without knots or swivels and feature very low memory, exceptional knot strength and durability.

Sufix Metered Performance Braid is strong, long casting and easy handling. The exclusive Y6 Braiding produces a rounder, smoother, thinner and quieter braided line. This line has an exceptionally high strength-to-diameter ratio so you can fit more line on your reel and reach greater depths. Metered Performance Braid also has very little stretch for amazing sensitivity and fast hooksets. Available in 40, 50, 65, 80 and 100 pound test.

Each Sufix monofilament fishing line has a set of features that make it ideal for specific situations or angler types. For strength, smooth casting and easy handling, opt for Elite or ProMix mono. For superior casting distance with pinpoint accuracy, go with Sufix Siege. If you’re a surf fisherman, Tritanium Plus monofilament will give you the toughness and long casting that you need. Our Superior line is incredibly strong – it ranks among the highest in tensile strength—ideal for hunting big gamefish. Key Lime IGFA-Rated monofilament fishing line offers maximum abrasion resistance and consistent tensile strength to meet IGFA standards. Ice Magic is high performance ice fishing monofilament and our Wind-On Premium Monofilament Leaders attach easily to your main line without knots or swivels.

Sufix Performance Braid is so easy handling it’s even compatible with spinning reels—something very few braided lines can claim. It resists wind knots and is ultra abrasion resistant so that you can fish this line in thick cover over and over without a single fray. Even with all this strength and durability, Performance Braid is highly sensitive. Low stretch means it takes little effort to hook even the lightest biting fish. Available in Lo-Vis Green, Hi-Vis Yellow and Fluorescent Neon Fire. A variety of test and spool sizes available, from 6 pound test up to 130 pound test.

Performance Ice Fuse has zero stretch so you have no doubt what’s happening at the end of your line. No need for a mighty jerk to set the hook either—simply tightening the line will get the job done. Enhanced abrasion resistance and superior tensile and knot strength mean that Ice Fuse will be on your reel for a long time. Availalble in Fluorescent Neon Fire and Smoke Blue and 4, 6, 8 and 10 pound test.

Sufix Performance Lead Core consists of a 10 color sequence with 10 yards per color, so you can quickly and easily target specific depths. The smaller line diameter of braid gives you more room on the reel and less drag in the water. Depending on the species of fish being targeted, you can choose from the following pound tests: 12, 15, 18, 27 and 36.

Performance Metered Tip-Up Ice Braid has all the benefits of Sufix ice braid—abrasion resistance, durability, low stretch, low diameter-to-strength ratio, low memory, fast sinking speed and exceptional cold weather handling—thanks to its HTP braid and Hydro Fusion Process. 5 foot metered braid allows you to target specific depths. 50 yard spools available in 15, 20, 30 and 50 pound test.

Sufix’s proprietary Hydro Fusion Process ensures the line descends like a bullet and comes off the spool straight and true. It also keeps the line flexible under extremely cold conditions for superior handling. Available in 50 yard spools in 15, 20, 30 and 50 pound test.

Sufix Performance V-Coat Tip-Up line is made with HTP, a high tenacity polyester braid that provides unmatched abrasion resistance, durability, low stretch and low diameter-to-strength ratios. The patented Hydro Fusion Process gives the tip-up line fast sinking speed and exceptional cold weather handling. V-Coat Tip-Up line is available in 50 yard spools of 15, 20, 30 or 50 pound test.

Once you’ve spooled on ProMix, your other reels will be collecting dust. This line is exceptionally smooth handling and glides off the spool for long, accurate casting. Its low stretch and high shock absorption ensure a good hookset, while the high knot strength gives you the confidence to fight the good fight. This is a true all-arounder that is perfect for a range of applications. 400 yard spools available in 6, 8, 10, 12, 14 and 17 lb. test.

Sufix Siege is smooth, supple and handles beautifully, yet is still exceptionally strong. Testing showed this line to have up to 15 times more abrasion resistance than other lines available today. Siege monofilament allows you to throw your lure exactly where you want it, and then pull it out of dense cover without any fear of breakage. Exceptional knot strength keeps a fighting fish on. 330 yard spools, ranging from 4 to 20 lb. test. 25 and 30 lb. test only available in 250 yards.

In addition to being incredibly strong, Superior monofilament is super abrasion resistant and can stand up to thick cover, rock shelves, coral and any other rough surfaces (or toothy fish) that inhabit your particular fishing location. The controlled stretch of this line allows for a fast recovery and excellent hook setting power. Superior mono is available in Clear, Hi-Vis Yellow and Smoke Blue colors. Choose from 6 lb. test up to 650 lb. test.

Choose from Performance Tip-Up Ice Braid, the standard in tip-up ice fishing, or Performance Metered Tip-Up Ice Braid, which is metered in 5 foot segments for precision depth management. For those fishing in severe cold, opt for Sufix V-Coat Tip-Up Line, which features a vinyl coating for extreme anti-freezing and water proofing.

The unbeatable abrasion resistance of Tritanium Plus makes it ideal for any fishing situation with rough obstacles, dense cover or toothy fish. This line can take a real beating and still not snap. High tensile and knot strength also lend a hand in making Tritanium Plus tough as nails. Available in Chartreuse, Clear and Dark Green and 8 to 100 lb. test.

Sufix Wind-On Monofilament Leaders are made of premium quality, small diameter monofilament leader material. These leaders are easy handling, with low memory for improved casting. Exceptional knot strength and extreme durability make the Wind-On Leader ideal for a variety of uses including big game fishing, jigging and trolling. Available in 20 lb. test up to 500 lb. test.

VMC All Purpose hooks include the Aberdeen, Siwash Closed Eye, Siwash Open Eye and Baitholder. The Aberdeen is a long shank, light wire hook ideal for live bait fishing. Available in Gold and Tin Red and a variety of sizes. The Siwash Closed Eye is the spoon, spinner and plug manufacturer favorite hook and the best replacement hook for any lure with a split ring. Use Open Eye version for lures without a split ring. In Perma Steel and Black Nickel finishes. Fresh and saltwater fisherman can assemble their own rigs with the Baitholder hook, featuring a turned down eye, offset point and barbed shank.
