html.body:
Recall of StrikeMaster® Lithium Lazer™ Ice Augers


MORE INFORMATION

The Hopper Popper can be fished aggressively or slow, creating a loud pop that will call fish in from far and wide. Morning or evening, mountain lake or backyard pond, one thing is constant—fish love this lure. The 1-1/2” Hopper Popper is available in 5 colors: Brown Yellow, Fire Tiger, Phantom Black, Phantom Orange and Phantom Yellow.

Meet your new favorite lures. Arashi® Rattling Flat swims with a tight wiggling action creating maximum flash and vibration. Includes a multi-ball rattle and long-cast design for increased distance and accuracy. The Rattling Deep swims with a moderate rolling action for the right amount of search with loads of tail kick. Multi-ball rattle and long-cast design. The Arashi Wake Crank runs just under the surface with a hard rolling action and a pronounced tail kick creating a large wake that draws attention. When stalking wary or pressured fish in shallow water, Arashi Silent Square is your go-to lure. The Silent Square runs with a lively rolling action and a pronounced tail kick. The buoyancy to back out of cover and square lip design for deflection are a perfect match for contacting structure. The Rattling Square features the same action, but includes a multi-ball rattle that precisely imitates baitfish feeding in the shallows.

The Chug Bug Series includes the original Rattlin’ Chug Bug, available in 2-1/2” or 3-1/4” and a variety of colors and patterns. For even more fish attracting power, try the Chug Bug MadFlash, which features a scaled body with internal MadFlash holographic patterns and 3-D holographic eyes. For saltwater topwater action, get the Chug Bug’s big brother, the Rattlin’ Saltwater Chug Bug. Same capabilities but with a bigger profile, saltwater specific color patterns and VMC Perma Steel hooks.

The FlatStick series includes the 8-1/2”, 3-5/8 oz. Giant FlatStick and the 6-1/2”, 1-3/4 oz. FlatStick. The FlatStick Jointed features a jointed tail design with a power and action that screams for attention. Available in 7-1/2”, 3 oz. and 6-1/4”, 1-3/4 oz. sizes. Each is offered in more than 10 colors, including UV Bright finish choices for strengthened visibility. They all also feature a loud, deep rattle and VMC black nickel treble hooks to get fish in the boat.

The Hot ‘N Tot Series includes the Original Hot ‘N Tot, which is exactly the same as the day it was introduced and a must for diehard fans and new anglers alike. To take it up a notch, try the Rattle Tot, which has a wider body with a loud, raspy, multi-ball rattle. Add some flash with the Hot ‘N Tot MadFlash. This lure features detailed external scale patterns, 3D holographic eyes and is available in holographic, painted, chrome and UV finishes.

The Kickin’ Stick is slow sinking and features a rattle for extra attraction. Works best with a slow to medium retrieve speed. Premium VMC black nickel hooks deliver fast, sure hooksets. This 5” lures is available in seven colors: Black Chrome, Blue Chrome Orange, Blue Steel Shad, Chrome Perch, Fire Tiger, Gizzard Shad and Rainbow Trout.

The Rockin’ Shad can be fished slow or fast, without rolling or turning sideways. This lure keeps working for you on the drop, too, shimmying and rocking as it descends on the slack line. A loud, multi-ball cadence rattle, 3D holographic eyes and premium VMC hooks round out the Rockin’ Shad’s fish-catching features. Available in 2-1/2” and 3” and a large variety of colors and patterns to match the forage of your target species.

The Smash Shad features a high frequency multi-ball rattle, external scales and premium VMC black nickel hooks. An impressive array of finishes are available to choose from, including UV Bright finishes that reflect more light energy for improved visibility. Available in 3 sizes for running depths varying from 4 to 12 feet.

SuspenDots and SuspenStrips are flexible and easy to cut, so you can tailor them exactly as needed. They can be quickly and easily applied anywhere on the lure. SuspenDots and SuspenStrips are self-adhesive and removable so that you can easily return the lure to its original state.

The WildEye Series includes a variety of shad, plus the irresistible Curl Tail Minnow and Swimming Crab. Shad options include the classic WildEye Swim Shad and the WildEye Rippin’ Swim Shad, which features a rattle chamber and treble belly hook to lure them in and hook ‘em good. The Suspending Swim Shad adds neutral buoyancy to the mix and can be fished in a variety of conditions and techniques. The Wildeye Spin Shad includes a holographic willow leaf blade for the ultimate in fish attracting flash and motion. Easily change with the conditions with Storm’s WildEye Pro Paddle Tail Kit. This kit features interchangeable jig heads with different weights for different conditions with a unique top slot in the bait so the body can be changed without re-tying.

Shadow Rap® 2016

A minnow in trouble makes dangerous moves. Struggling, it lunges in jerking motions, then it falls slowly with a quivering fade … just like the Shadow Rap.

SEE THE ACTION

Updated Privacy Policy

Please take a moment to read the terms of the privacy policy for Rapala.com. They have recently changed.

Privacy Policy

The Shadow Rap features a minnow or shad body style, flat sides and a metallic finish with textured scales. The look and swimming action of this lure is so close to a real minnow or shad that is on its last leg, fish are simply unable to resist. Sharp left to right turns allow you to fish the Shadow Rap with little forward travel, so you can stay in the strike zone longer. The Shadow Rap series of lures feature super sharp VMC black nickel round bend hooks and are available in 24 color patterns.

Shift Baitcasting reels weigh in at just 6 ounces. A 6.5:1 high speed gear ratio allows for a super quick retrieve and a custom machined swept star drag helps you play in that fish just right. A lightweight, high-inertia aluminum V-Spool, magnetic brake system, and Sure-Set Instant Anti-Reverse deliver trouble-free casting and hook setting. The Shift Spinning Reel is lightweight, yet rock solid enough to take down just about any freshwater fish. It features a large arbor spool design for increased casting distance and line capacity and an ultra smooth multi-disk drag system. Sure-Set Instant Anti-Reverse, exclusive Rapala bail trip mechanism and oversized diameter bail arm are just a few of the other features that make this an outstanding spinning reel.

The list of features for the Concept Ti fishing rods is an impressive one. Whether you choose the baitcasting rod or the spinning rod, rest assured it’s a fully loaded, fish catching machine. The Concept Ti stick includes Fuji SK2 reel seats, which significantly reduce weight versus conventional reel seats. Fuji Titanium Guides offer minimum weight, improved balance and optimum load distribution. Fuji SiC guide rings feature silicon carbide inserts for virtually frictionless casting. A Hypalon EVA handle offers the angler less hand and wrist fatigue than other materials. Baitcasting rod available in 6’7”, 7’1”, 7’2”, 7’7” and 8’0”. Spinning rod available in 6’3”, 6’6”, 6’9”, 7’1” and 7’2”.

Rapala Concept Ti Casting and Spinning rods begin with state of the art NTi2 Nano-Resin Technology Composites blanks. Power Taper Construction delivers extra-fast action. Fuji SK2 reel seats, Fuji K-Series Guides, and Fuji SiC guide rings complete the package for some of the lightest, strongest, most accurate fishing rods you can buy. The Shift Baitcasting reels (available in left- or right-handed models) are lightweight, with a super fast retrieve gear ratio and superior fish stopping drag system. The Shift Bait Spinning reel is a stronger, more reliable and efficient reel thanks to its all-metal body. A large arbor spool design, multi-disk drag system and exclusive Rapala bail trip mechanism sweeten the deal.

The Swimmin’ Stick is a slow sinking bait, which allows you to fish a variety of depths. An integrated lip provides extra durability for bouncing off structure and doing battle with hard fighting fish. Premium VMC black nickel hooks ensure a strong hook set. The Swimmin’ Stick is available in 5” or 6” and 7 color patterns including: Black Chrome, Blue Chrome Orange, Blue Steel Shad, Chrome Perch, Fire Tiger, Gizzard Shad, and Rainbow Trout.

The Original Thin Fin’s flat sides and deep body give it an erratic, darting action with a whole lot of flash. The 2-1/2” size is perfect for 3-8 feet of water, the 3” size runs in 4-10 feet. A large variety of colors let you find the right match for the conditions. Colors include: Black Crappie, Bluegill, Bone, Dracula, Hot Tiger, Metallic Gold Black, Metallic Silver Blue, Metallic Silver Gold, Metallic Silver Red, Perch, Silver Shad and Solid Fluorescent Red.

The ThunderStick lures all feature the natural shape and rolling action of a minnow – a favorite meal for fish everywhere. Loud rattles and premium VMC hooks top off this irresistible bait. The series includes the Original ThunderStick, featuring the original molds, components, patterns and colors. When fish are holding deep, the Original ThunderStick Deep can reach depths of up to 24 feet. For even more of that legendary searching, wide, wobbling action, opt for the Original Jointed ThunderStick. The ThunderStick MadFlash offers maximum flash and is available in a Deep model for depths up to 24 feet. The Deep Baby ThunderStick has a tight action that runs true at high speeds and is very slow rising on the pause – extra deadly with a stop-and-go retrieve.

The Twitch Stick excels when there are suspended baitfish. As the name implies, this lure is designed for twitching. Even the most subtle twitch retrieve will impart an aggressive swimming action. On the pause, the bait wobbles as it comes to rest, drawing strikes. The Twitch Stick is available in 3-1/4” and 4” and nearly 20 different color patterns so you can match the forage no matter where your fishing spot is.

The ThunderCraw features a realistic crayfish shape and claws that fall in an “up” defense position just like the real thing. Fish the ThunderCraw in 3-5 feet of water around visible cover or flip it through heavy vegetation. Hop it along the cover or jig it slowly in the vegetation to impart the wide vibrating motion and rattle that fish can’t resist. This 2-3/4” lure comes in 5 detailed craw patterns to match your specific conditions: Brown, Phantom Brown, Phantom Chartreuse, Phantom Red and Red.

The Wart Series of lures all feature the classic Wart side-to-side, searching action, loud rattle and premium VMC hooks. The Original Wiggle Wart features the original molds, components, patterns and colors (nearly 40!). The Original Mag Wart is slightly larger, with a high buoyancy for backing out of cover on the pause. The Deep Rattlin’ Flat Wart’s flat sides create a hard flash and tight vibration, while its extreme buoyancy make it ideal for submerged trees and rock piles. The Wiggle Wart MadFlash boasts 3D holographic eyes and an external scale pattern with UV Bright and traditional color finishes for a super realistic presentation.

The Banjo Eye jig’s balanced weight makes it ideal for vertical jigging. The Arrow Head jig excels when fished with a swimming jig retrieve, thanks to its arrow shaped head. On both, a real deer hair Bucktail flows and undulates with perfection while a soft, ribbon tail adds extra enticement. Both bucktail jigs feature a VMC Cone Cut Perma Steel hook specific to saltwater applications. A bait retainer holds the bait in place on the shank of the hook. The Banjo Eye bucktail jig is available in 3/4 oz., 2 oz. and 4 oz, and 4 color patterns: Chartreuse/White, Glow/Chartreuse, Red/White and White. The Arrow Head jig is available in 3.5 oz and 5.0 oz and Chartreuse or White.

The Game Fish Kit has all the lures you’ll need for any game fishing, especially Dorado, Tuna and Sailfish. It includes two Tuna Catchers Rigged 6”, two Dorado Catchers Rigged 6” and two Sailfish Catchers Rigged 6”. Each are rigged with premium VMC hooks and are packed in a saltwater resistant, easy-to-clean mesh storage bag. It’s an unbeatable value for a set of lures that’ll produce catch after catch.

The Heavy Speed Jig Kit includes one 200 g and one 300g Abyss Jig, and one 250g and one 400g Benthos Jig. Both the Abyss and Benthos jigs feature an exclusive design that drops them into the strike zone like a bullet, plus steel core inner reinforcing that’ll take a beating and stay true for the next drop. All four jigs are pre-rigged with a premium VMC single assist hook. Packaged in an easy-to-clean mesh storage bag.

The Jet Popper’s deep cup face creates a loud “popping” effect, while jet holes produce a tantalizing bubble trail. And if the sound and commotion weren’t enough, internal flash foil adds another layer of attraction. This lure casts like a bullet yet is stable on the retrieve. Built-in, heavy-duty swivels and VMC Fish Fighter hooks make sure fish make it into the boat. The Jet Popper comes in 5.25”/2 oz. and 7”/4.5 oz. Colors include Black Purple, Blue Sardine, Dorado, Mullet, Natural Silver and Red White Flame.

The Popper Pro is weighted for long casts, with an in-line hook design for the best swimming action, point exposure and hook set. Heavy-duty VMC hooks seal the deal and rugged stainless steel through wire construction ensures the lure can take a beating. The Popper Pro is available in 2 sizes: 5.125” and 7”. Seven natural and bright color patterns give anglers plenty of options to match the conditions. Color patterns include: Ayu, Blue Sardine, Bruised Purple, Dorado, Green Mackerel, Black Purple Phantom, and Red Head Flash.

Williamson’s Single Assist Hooks feature a super sharp, rugged Black Nickel VMC hook and heavy-duty Dacron covered with protective tubing to prevent chafing. The swinging cord handily doubles as a fish attractant. Rig the Single Assist Hook to the top of the lure to reduce snags on the bottom or wrecks, and to prevent fish from using the weight of the lure to throw the hook. A stiff rig inhibits tangling around the leader. Available in a variety of hook sizes and lengths, from a 3/0 hook and 2-3/8” length up to an 11/0 hook and 5-3/4” length.

The Speed Pro Deep features a patent pending “Auto-Tune” free moving line tie. This innovative design is self centering, keeping the lure aligned even at high trolling speeds. The lure maintains its smooth swimming action up to 15 knots, which gives anglers the freedom to fish on a lighter line, even with a light drag setting. The Speed Pro Deep is fully outfitted with VMC heavy duty Perma-Steel hooks and heavy-duty oval split rings to stand the test of time and toothy fish. The 6.25” size has a running depth of 12-18’, while the 7” size runs in 15-20’. Colors include Ayu, Blue Sardine, Bruised Purple, Green Mackerel, Purple Mackerel, Red Head and White Tiger.

Williamson’s Tandem Assist Hooks feature two staggered, opposing Black Nickel VMC hooks. This maximizes hook-ups, without interfering with the lure or the main line. Rig the Tandem Assist Hooks to the top of the lure to reduce snags on the bottom or wrecks, and to prevent fish from using the weight of the lure to throw the hook. The Tandem Assist Hooks are made of heavy-duty Dacron covered with protective tubing to prevent chafing. A stiff rig inhibits tangling around the leader. Available in M, L and XL.

Both the Single and Tandem Assist Hooks feature premium VMC black nickel hooks for fast, sure hook sets. The hooks are attached via heavy Dacron with protection tubing that prevents chafing. The Tandem Assist Hooks are available in 3 different sizes. Single Assist Hooks come in 10 different sizes, from 3/0 up to 11/0 hook sizes.

Williamson’s line of hard baits includes the Popper Pro, Surface Pro and Jet Popper. These saltwater topwater lures are each precisely weighted for maximum casting distance and can be fished a variety of ways (pop on the top, walk the dog, slash and stall). Super strong construction enables you to fight monsters. Also included in the lineup is the Speed Pro Deep, designed to deliver consistent action at very high trolling speeds, up to 15 knots. An “Auto-Tune” free-moving line-tie self centers and automatically aligns the lure so that it runs true at any speed.

Williamson’s Herring Jig is a fast-diving jig with a flat and slightly curved profile that creates a wide, fluttering action on the drop. A versatile jig that’s easy to fish. The Vortex Speed Jig boasts an innovative hydrodynamic design with opposing concave and convex sides that allow the jig to rotate effortlessly on the fall. Each side has a separate finish for a unique visual effect and attractive flash. The Abyss Speed Jig’s unique and exclusive design enables it to drop faster into the strike zone and has a very low retrieve drag co-efficient for a less tiring day. The diamond shape of the Benthos Speed Jig gets it down to where the fish are super fast, even in the heaviest drifts. The Gomame and Gomoku jigs feature high quality foil finishes and a pronounced wounded baitfish action. Great for catching all kinds of pelagic fish.

Vertical jigging, also known as high speed jigging, is the hottest technique in saltwater fishing today, and Williamson’s metal jigs meet the challenge. All are fast-diving, and the Abyss and Benthos jigs feature “Steel core” inner reinforcing to stay true even after the most ferocious attacks. VMC assist hooks help ensure fewer missed strikes. Our Gomame and Gomoku jigs feature an erratic, wounded baitfish action and high quality foil finishes for second to none fish attraction. If the classics are more your speed, Williamson’s bucktail saltwater jigs are a must.

slot-configuration.description: Saltwater Fishing Tools and Fillet KnivesWilliamson

html.body: Our Heavy Duty Split Ring pliers feature an offset design, ergonomic grips and spring loaded handle for easy, one handed operation. The serrated edge of our Mono Shears easily cuts any size monofilament or fluorocarbon line and the same ergonomic grips and spring loaded handle provide comfort and ease of use. The Double Leverage Pliers and Cutters feature a double, high leverage handle for 60% more power. Carbon steel with nickel plating provide extra corrosion resistance. Williamson’s fillet knives are made by Marttiini, the same company that makes the classic Rapala Fillet Knife. Each one is hand finished to a razor sharp edge. Slim, Straight and Curved saltwater fillet knives are available to accommodate all filleting needs.

Williamson’s collection of saltwater fillet knives includes the Slim Fillet Knife, Curved Fillet Knife and Straight Fillet Knife. The Slim Fillet Knife has a razor sharp slim, medium flex blade—perfect for tight areas, precision cuts and fine detail. The Curved Fillet Knife features a curved, no flex blade. Use this for filleting and steaking big game fish. If you need an all-around fillet knife for fish of all sizes, opt for the Straight Fillet Knife. All knives are made with European stainless steel, which is known for the way it takes and holds an ultra-sharp edge. Each has a progressively tapered blade with a mirror polished finish and an ergonomically designed co-molded handle to assure a comfortable grip.

The Light Speed Jig Kit includes one 60 g and one 150g Abyss Jig, and one 100g and one 200g Benthos Jig. Both the Abyss and Benthos jigs feature an exclusive design that drops them into the strike zone like a bullet, plus steel core inner reinforcing that’ll take a beating and stay true for the next drop. All four jigs are pre-rigged with a premium VMC single assist hook. Packaged in an easy-to-clean mesh storage bag.

Our Heavy Duty Split Ring pliers feature an offset design, ergonomic grips and spring loaded handle for easy, one handed operation. The serrated edge of our Mono Shears easily cuts any size monofilament or fluorocarbon line and the same ergonomic grips and spring loaded handle provide comfort and ease of use. The Double Leverage Pliers and Cutters feature a double, high leverage handle for 60% more power. The extra power of the Double Leverage Cutter allows you to cut large hooks, line and leaders with ease. Both come with a deluxe sheath with belt loop for convenience. Carbon steel with nickel plating provide extra corrosion resistance.

The design of Williamson’s trolling feathers appeals to all kinds of baitfish, including bonito, mackerel, bluefish, small dorado and tuna. Nearby fish are instantly attracted to the flash of the polished metal head in the water. The attraction becomes an urge to strike as the feathers and flash dance by. Each Flash Feather lure trolls from 3 to 7 knots and features an extra strong Sufix mono leader and VMC Perma Steel hook. Available with a single 2/0 hook and 80 lb. leader, a 3/0 hook and 80 lb. leader, or a 5/0 hook and 100 lb. leader.

Williamson’s “catcher” series of light trolling lures includes Tuna, Sailfish, Dorado, Wahoo and the Big Game Catcher. Both Tuna Catcher lures feature an acrylic bullet head and come prerigged with Sufix mono. The Tuna Catcher Flash adds tinsel and glow Flashabou to the mix for extra attraction. The Wahoo Catcher is prerigged with nylon coated wire. A jet head creates incredible skirt flare and commotion. The soft versions of the Sailfish Catcher and Dorado Catcher use a soft head that reduces feel when mouthed by a fish. Holographic 3D eye and holographic glitter amp up the attraction factor. The Big Game Catcher is a heavy-duty 8” jig with an erratic action that draws massive strikes. An excellent all-around lure for billfish and big gamefish worldwide.

Williamson’s Live Series Soft Lures don’t just look like the real thing, they swim like it too. The Mackerel, Squid, Ribbonfish and Ballyhoo so perfectly imitate the swimming action of their living, breathing cousins you’ll never want to use live bait again. Each Live Series lure features Williamson’s patented Hook Lock System to ensure the perfect hook presentation and maximum strike efficiency. The Live Mackerel and Live Squid offer multiple rigging ports for easy and varied rigging. The Live Ballyhoo has two nose rigging options, and is available Pro-Rigged or J-Rigged. Both Ballyhoo Combos feature a Sailfish Catcher to add extra commotion to your spread.

As a starter pack or a one-off weekender kit, the Master Kit can’t be beat. It features a Dorado Jig, Dorado Catcher, Sailfish Catcher, and a Rigged Tuna Catcher. If tuna is on the menu, opt for the Tuna Catcher Kit, with four of the best rigged baits for landing tuna. Made for high speed, these lures will stay true up to 9 knots. For speed jigging in 50 to 100 meters or strong current conditions, check out the Heavy Speed Jig Kit, featuring 2 Abyss and 2 Benthos jigs. The Light Speed Kit is your choice for shallow or slow current. Our Game Fish Kit will meet all your needs for game fishing, especially Dorado, Tuna and Sailfish. All lure kits are rigged with premium VMC hooks and come in a saltwater resistant, easy-to-clean mesh storage bag.

Williamson’s inventory of trolling lures covers all the bases and includes feather lures, light trolling lures, soft lures, lure kits and spreader bars & teaser. Our saltwater lures are armed with VMC heavy duty, super sharp, saltwater hooks, and some with a patented Hook Locking System that keeps the hook in proper alignment for consistent hook ups. Lures that are pre-rigged with mono leaders use only premium Sufix leader line for unbeatable tensile and knot strength. Lure Kits are professionally rigged and are an excellent turnkey solution for any fishing trip. Our spreader bars are made with Williamson Live Series baits and are simply the best spreader bars available.

The Tuna Catcher Kit includes four Tuna Catcher Rigged 5” lures. The Tuna Catchers are pre-rigged with premium VMC hooks and 5’ of 130 lb. Sufix mono leader. These are high-speed performers that will hold true up to 9 knots. The four lures come in a handy, saltwater resistant mesh storage bag for easy organization and clean up.

The Live Squid Spreader Bar includes 15 pro-rigged Live Series Squid baits with a 2/0 crane swivel and snap-on 300 lb. Sufix leader. The total length is 8 feet and the running speed is 2-8 knots. The Live Ballyhoo Spreader Bar has the same features, but is rigged with Live Ballyhoo soft lures. Williamson’s Exciter Birds teasers splash and flutter on the surface to add activity to your spread. Use the Exciter Bird as a lead on a daisy chain teaser, or make an entire Exciter Bird daisy chain, or connect the Exciter Bird in front of your favorite lure as an added attractor.

Terminator QuickSkirts do away with ordinary rubber banded spinnerbait skirts. Change up your presentation by simply sliding one on. No time wasted and no worries about damaging the skirts. The classic QuickSkirts come in 15 fish attracting and forage based color patterns so you can match an endless amount of conditions. 3 per pack. The Power Pulse QuickSkirts feature extended accent tails for an exaggerated flowing presentation, removing the need for a trailer. Available in 10 colors. 2 per pack.

From the indestructible T-1 Titanium, Thump’r and Twin Spin Spinnerbaits to the S-1 Super Stainless models each incorporates premium components that really make a difference. QuickSkirt fast change silicone skirts easily let you adjust to the ever changing conditions, while SnapBack Titanium technology means you never have to tune these baits. Constructed with premium plated, beveled-edge blades, VMC® hooks and pro caliber swivels these baits are so good, Bass Can’t Bust ’em.

Our umbrella rigs come ready to rig with your choice of lures, swimbaits, grubs, spinnerbait or jigs. Black nickel finish helps mask the wire and a long center arm imitates a lagging baitfish. Arms collapse for easy storage. The Titanium Rig’s patented SnapBack Titanium wire frame provides a long-lasting, non-breaking, consistently shaped spread. The Stainless Steel umbrella rig can be adjusted into multiple configurations so you can simulate a variety of baitfish schools. Available in 5”, 8” and 10” body lengths. Body colors include Chartreuse White Shad, Blue Shad, Gold Shiner and Crappie.

The Original Titanium Buzzbait’s huge splash and turned rivet for extra sound make it an awesome topwater bait and a must-have for every bass angler. Titanium SnapBack frame takes a beating and stays true. The Super Stainless Buzzbait is 30% more bend resistant than traditional stainless frames. A flat head design gets it on top of the water quickly. The Tandem Buzz gives off 47% more vibration than ordinary buzzbaits and makes twice the noise and bubble trail. All feature a QuickSkirt changeable premium silicone skirt.

Get to know our fishing jig collection. The Pro Series Jig is a universal bass jig for flipping, pitching and casting in and around cover. The Football Jig features a unique head design for controlled dragging and a balanced stance—it works in any water depth, sand, gravel and rock bottoms. Tackle heavy cover and stay snag-free with the Weedless Football Jig. Our Finesse Jig is designed specifically for slower presentations in deep and shallow water. The balanced swimming head of the Swim Jig lets you swim it or bounce it along the bottom. All the while, the brush guard wards off weeds. All Terminator jigs feature a custom silicone skirt, brush guard (except Football Jig) and premium VMC hook.

Terminator In-Line Spinners come with 4/0 hooks and are pre-rigged with a soft plastic body. An extra soft body is also provided. Truly snagless, these spinners power through heavy cover and will stand the test of time, thanks to the super tough Titanium frame. Choose between 3/8-oz. and 5/8-oz. and the following colors: Chartreuse Silver Flake, Electric Chicken, Root Beer, Salt/Pepper Chartreuse and White.

Our Single Strand Titanium Leader Wire is made of nickel Titanium that stretches like monofilament and is more cut-proof, kink-proof and longer lasting than ordinary stainless steel wire. Features a corrosion-proof, low visibility non reflective smoke black finish. 7-Strand Titanium Lightweight Leaders and Multi-Strand Titanium Leaders are highly kink and coil resistant and ultra durable. The 7-Strand leader is available in 15 lb. and 30 lb. sizes. The Multi-Strand leader is available in 50 lb, 75 lb. and 100 lb. sizes.

The smokeless Big Volt Electric packs a punch and a Boron steel chipper blade, making it ideal for re-opening existing holes. If you’re looking for a workhorse and a great all-around auger, you can’t go wrong with the Electra Lazer. The StrikeMaster Lithium Lazer auger boasts the most modern technology available, with a lithium battery that provides consistent speed and torque without reduced power or slow down from a waining battery. The Lithium Lazer can drill 56 holes in 24” of ice on a single charge. It’s simply the best of the best in electric ice augers.

StrikeMaster’s 2-stroke gas ice augers, with their American-made transmission components and Swedish blades offer the power and durability to punch holes all day, season after season. Re-open holes with the Chipper Lite or Chipper Magnum. Get the most powerful auger on the market with the Lazer Pro or go for the Lazer Mag, considered the Cadillac of power augers for its timeless quality and speed. You can’t go wrong with the Magnum, StrikeMaster’s workhorse and an auger as dependable as daylight. For the leader in 4-stroke technology, go with the Honda 35cc Lite gas ice auger—it’s the perfect combination of noiseless horsepower, steadfast reliability and clean speed.

What you’ll find here: chrome-alloy Swedish stainless steel blades for the Lazer Synthetic Ultra-Lite Hand Auger, chrome-alloy Swedish stainless steel blades for Lazer Hand Augers, Swedish boron steel “blue” replacement blades for the Mora auger, and heavy duty plastic blade guards for both Lazer and Mora hand augers.

slot-configuration.description: Hand Ice Auger Parts and AccessoriesStrikeMaster

html.body: Did you lose some parts in the snow? Get replacement blade screws and the wing bolt for Lazer and Mora augers here. You can also find replacement handles for all adjustable style StrikeMaster Lazer and Mora hand augers, as well as a top handle knob assembly. A hand auger extension is also available to extend your boring depth an additional 12”.

The Mora hand auger yields value no other entry-level auger can deliver. It’s iconic powder blue drill features high-alloy carbon steel Mora blades that are power coated to reduce ice build-up. Lean and mean, the Lazer Synthetic Ultra-Lite weighs in at just 5 pounds for the 6” drill and 4.5 pounds for the 4” drill. Take the Ultra-Lite along and punching holes all day will take less of a toll on you. Get a standard Lazer and get a hand ice auger with ninja skills. Available in 4” through 8” drill sizes.

Lazer ice augers look simple on the surface, but a closer look reveals that every element is carefully designed for comfort, speed and precision. The chrome alloy stainless steel blades are razor sharp for effortless drilling. The powder coated paint reduces ice build-up. The handles are cushioned and ergonomically designed for comfort and ease of operation. The adjustable handle adjusts from 48”-57” to accommodate different ice thicknesses and angler heights. The auger breaks down into two pieces for easy transport and storage. Taken together, all of these elements make the Lazer ice auger the first choice of ice angling pros and enthusiasts the world over.

There are many reasons why the Mora ice auger is one of the world’s best selling hand augers. Its high alloy carbon steel blades chew through the ice, making short work of even the thickest ice. Low torque is needed, which makes the drill easy to turn and the ergonomically designed, telescoping handle with comfort grips reduces hand fatigue. All of this comes in a package that weighs anywhere between just 6 and 8 pounds depending on the drill size. The Mora ice auger is the perfect choice for someone new to ice angling or for anglers who like the lightweight portability of a hand auger.
Get a Single Chipper Drill Unit in either 8.25” or 10.25”. Lazer auger bits are available in 5”, 6”, 7”, 8” and 10”. Both options include blade(s), blade guard, collar bolt and allen wrench.

StrikeMaster’s full list of ice auger blades and blade covers include: Lazer Power Replacement Blades (includes 2 blades and 4 screws), Chipper Replacement Blade (blade and 2 screws), Dual Step Replacement Blades (Solo Engines Only. 2 steel Chipper blades with 2 blade bolts), Combo Pack for the 10” Lazer 224 (2 10” Lazer Power blades, 2 6” Hand Auger Blades); Strike-Lite Replacement Blades (for the original Strike-Lite 8” Synthetic Auger), Snap Cap Blade Guard, Lazer Blade Guard, Chipper Blade Guard, Lazer 224 Blade Guard and Rubber Guard Strap.

slot-configuration.description: Power Ice Auger Parts and AccessoriesStrikeMaster

html.body: With StrikeMaster parts, you can service your ice auger from top to bottom. Put in new spark plugs, change the oil, replace missing gas caps and sharpen the blades. Get amped up with a replacement or back up battery, battery charger or car charger. Extend your boring depth with the Power Auger Extension and keep your auger protected when not in use with the Power Auger Storage Case. Power your hand auger with an electric drill with our Electric Ice Drill Adapter. Get blade screws, collar bolts and allen wrenches too. When it comes to StrikeMaster ice auger parts, we’ve got you covered.

StrikeMaster’s electric ice augers offer premium cutting power without the noise and smoke. Surprisingly powerful and juiced up enough to drill holes all day on one charge. Our gas ice augers are the ultimate in power in speed, yet are lightweight and clean. 2-stroke and 4-stroke models available, all with an American-made transmission. All StrikeMaster power ice augers feature a polymer gear casting for featherweight power, VANDAR® long filament, high impact handles and Lazer blades.

The Snagless In-Line Spinner attracts fish with its nickel or gold plated Oklahoma blades – best-in-class for flash and vibration. A soft plastic body with curly tail adds extra enticement. 4/0 hooks are tough and sharp to ensure fish stay hooked. Choose between 3/8-oz. and 5/8-oz. and the following color patterns: Chartreuse Silver Flake, Electric Chicken, Root Beer, Salt/Pepper Chartreuse and White. Package includes one extra soft plastic body.

Dr. Juice Super Juice fish attractant triggers the attack pheromones found in all species to turn even the most disinterested fish into aggressors. Disguise any foreign smells that your lures emit and trigger predatory instincts with just a drop or two of Super Juice. The Super Juice concentrate is available in a 1.25 oz. bottle and both Walleye and Trout/Salmon scents. The Dr. Juice Tournament Super Juice offers anglers more variety, with scents to specifically target Bass, Walleye, Northern Pike/Muskie, Salmon/Trout and Panfish/Crappie. Tournament Juice attractant comes in 8 oz. bottles with pump spray.

Turn fish heads with the sonic vibrations of the Super Vibrax Tri-Pack. Each kit includes three 1/8 oz. lures with size 1 blades featuring pro-picked color sets. The laser holographic and painted finishes and flashing tail fibers of the Flash Series Kit will turn a curious fish into a hooked fish. Kit includes 5 lures with either size 1 or size 2 blades. The spoons in the Cast Champ Kit cast like a bullet so you can get in contact with as many fish as possible. Available in 3-packs or 5-packs. Be seen in the dark with the glow-in-the-dark skirt and Flashabou fibers of the Glow Skirt Kit. 5 per kit, with size 1 blades. Catch fish after fish with the classic tear drop spoon shape of the lures in the Strobe Spoon Kit. Tried and true, with proven patterns. Kit includes 5 lures with size 2 blades or 4 lures with size 3 blades. Attract the big one with the wider profile of the lures in the Whip Tail Kit. Comes in 5-packs of either size 0, 1, or 2 blades.

The Vibrax Bullet and Bullet Fly feature an inline blade design that runs 2 to 6 feet. The inline design allows the blade to spin directly on the shaft in a wider arc, creating more vibration. That’s extra vibration in addition to what’s created when the brass gear rubs against the bell of the patented two part mainbody. The Bullet Fly includes a dressed tail for added life-like attraction. Available in blade sizes 0 through 6 and a variety of plated or painted finishes./p>

Updated Privacy Policy

Please take a moment to read the terms of the privacy policy for Rapala.com. They have recently changed.

Privacy Policy

The Trigger X Panfish plastics collection features all of the classic baits that have been staples for generations. Minnows, nymphs, larvae, grubs and worms are all represented. Each one’s size and texture perfectly matches the real thing, so you can skip the trip to the bait store. Each panfish plastic bait is available in a variety of natural, fluorescent, solid or top-to-bottom dual colors and long-lasting Ultra Glow patterns.

StrikeMaster’s Bait Puck is the perfect storage solution for waxies, maggots, mousies and other creepy crawlies. Insulated to keep the right temperature, crush-proof and refrigerator safe. For even more convenience, the Bait Puck Plus includes a bait separator to quickly and easily expose your waxies, maggots, etc.—a big benefit for numb fingers. The Bait Bucket is water tight, insulated and refrigerator safe. The rubber gasket in the lid that keeps it air-tight can be removed for long-term bait storage.

The Glide-Lite features a rugged, roto-molded body and skis made specifically to stand up to freezing temperatures and rough ice. The storage space of the sled is well thought out, with a main compartment roomy enough for your flasher, underwater camera and other gear. A smaller front compartment is perfect for bait pucks. Vertical rod holders are molded into the base for quick access and the included seat cover fits standard 5 or 6 gallon buckets.

From our bait pucks to our Glide-Lite Sled, every detail has been designed with the ice angler in mind. Like our Tony Roach Ice Troller Bag. Developed by ice trolling master Tony Roach, this bag holds all of your essential gear within easy reach so you can move from hole to hole with ease. Our Bait Pucks are crush-proof and insulated to keep bait at just the right temperature. Our Bait Bucket is a water-tight, insulated, refrigerator-safe solution for fast and efficient fishing. Add some ice skimmers and a bucket tray cover, and your list is complete. Then put all of your ice fishing supplies, plus your rods and sonar, into the rugged Glide-Lite Sled and get to it.

The Tony Roach Ice Troller Bag has a waterproof, soft-sided shell—no freezing or cracking in the extreme cold. It includes a shoulder strap, internal divider and cell phone and GPS pockets. Plano tackle box and two Bait Pucks are also included.

The beauty of the Finesse Jig is that it’s a guaranteed winner, and a jig that can be fished just about all year and from coast to coast. The smaller size offers a bite size meal that even lazy fish can’t pass up. The half skirt gives a bug-like appearance and stellar colors like Green Pumpkin Orange and June Bug make it too tempting to ignore. A single-strand braided wire weed guard prevents snags and a VMC Black Nickel Hook ensures hook ups. Available in 1/8-oz., 3/16-oz. and 1/4-oz.

The exclusive head design of the Pro Series Jig is specially made to penetrate cover. A color matched brush guard helps avoid snags and a VMC Black Nickel hook delivers sure hooksets. A half skirt imparts a bug-like look, while a rattle and custom skirt colors amp up the fish attracting power of these jigs. Available in 1/4 oz., 3/8 oz., 1/2 oz., 3/4 oz. and 1 oz. Colors include: Black/Blue/Purple, Blue Olive, Blue Pumpkin, Electric Blue, Green Pumpkin, Green Pumpkin Orange, June Bug, Peanut Butter Jelly, Pumpkin Brown Black, Pumpkin Green, Pumpkin Orange, and White.

The Football Jig is designed for any water depth, sand, gravel and rock bottoms. Drag it on bottom, down ledges and drops, hop it, or stroke it. Custom silicone half-skirts give a bug-like appearance and a VMC Black Nickel hook guarantees a strong hookset. Available in 1/2-oz., 3/4-oz. and 1-oz and the following colors: Black/Blue/Purple, Green Pumpkin, Green Pumpkin Orange, Peanut Butter Jelly, Pumpkin Brown Black, and Pumpkin Orange.

Terminator QuickSkirts have unbeatable action. The pulsing, flowing motion combined with over a dozen fish attracting colors consistently draws strikes. The easy-to-use design enables anglers to quickly change skirts on the fly to match feeding habits. 15 vivid colors ensure that anglers can find the right color pattern for any situation. Colors include: Blue Shad, Blue/White/Chartreuse, Bright White Shad, Chartreuse Silver Shad, Chartreuse White Shad, Gizzard Shad, Gold Shiner, Green Perch, Hot Tip Chartreuse, Ragin Texas Red, Sharp Chartreuse, Silver Shiner, Speckled Trout, Sunburst Shad Chartreuse, and Zebra Shad.

Power Pulse QuickSkirts are favored by both professionals and casual anglers alike. Full bodied, silicone skirts with the longer trailing extension strands create an irresistible commotion. A wide selection of some of the best baitfish patterns available help to seal the deal. Power Pulse QuickSkirts come two per pack, and are available in 10 vivid, long-lasting colors including: Bluegill, Crappie, Emerald Shiner, Gold Shiner, Hot Shad, Perch, Pumpkinseed, Silver Shiner, Sunfish, and Yellow Perch.

The Terminator Swim Jig has a balanced swimming head and a thinly dressed and accented silicone skirt. A light brush guard keeps the weeds at bay. A 30° VMC hook makes sure you land your catch. Available in 1/4 oz. and 3/8 oz. and the following proven fish-catching colors: Black/Blue, Black/Blue/Purple, Emerald Shiner, Gold Shiner, Perch, Silver Shiner, Sunfish and Yellow Perch.

The Weedless Football Jig is designed for any water depth, sand, gravel and rock bottoms. Custom silicone full skirts And the Heavy-Duty VMC Wide Gap hook can handle bumps and thumps and stays super sharp. Available in 1/2-oz., 3/4-oz. and 1-oz and the following colors: Black/Blue/Purple, Green Pumpkin, Green Pumpkin Orange, Peanut Butter Jelly, Pumpkin Brown Black, and Pumpkin Orange.

Speed Pro Deep

Standing out of the crowd, the Speed Pro Deep features the first-of-its-kind Auto-Tune free-moving line tie system that is self-centering, automatically aligning the lure for consistent action at very high trolling speeds — up to 15 knots — with optimum action at 6-10 knots. Even when trolled at 15 knots, the Speed Pro Deep’s swimming action allows the lure to be fished on lighter line, even with a light drag setting.

Shop Now

slot-configuration.description: Free Shipping for Rapala Employees to MINNETONKA or EAGAN
slot-configuration.callout-msg: For FREE SHIPPING please use the Minnetonka mailing address as the ship to address. If you choose to ship to another address then shipping and surcharges will apply. For Free Shipping use the applicable address: (Your Name), 10395 Yellow Circle Dr, Hopkins, MN 55343-9101 - Or - (Your Name), 935 Aldrin Dr, Eagan, MN 55121-2385.

html.body: Free Shipping for employees to Minnetonka or Eagan (details)

The Flash Spinner features a diecast and chrome painted mainbody with a 3D eye. A dressed tail with flashabou fibers and a brass stamped blade add even more attraction. The blade design allows for smooth rotation while keeping the bait down in the strike zone, and a VMC hook keeps your hook-up rates high. The Flash Spinner is available in blade sizes 1 and 2 and the following colors: Black/Chartreuse, Blue Shad, Firetiger, Rainbow Trout, Shad and Shiner. /p>

The Classic Vibrax has a patented two-part body that emits low-frequency sound vibrations that attract fish and trigger strikes while virtually eliminating line twist. The body is composed of machined brass that comes either silver or copper plated, or with painted, printed or UV Bright finishes. A free-turning brass gear with an anti-line-twist design generates that irresistible vibration when it rubs against the bell. A premium VMC hook penetrates quickly and is perfectly tempered for strength. Blade finishes include brass stamped, silver or copper plated and painted or printed patterns. Available in blades sizes 0 through 6. Sizes 3-6 include proper size siwash.

The Minnow Spin features a balsa wood body with a natural minnow profile. An inline stamped brass blade comes in plated and printed patterns. A VMC treble hook ensures quick penetration and resists bending. Available in blade size 1 and either 1/8 oz. or 3/16 oz. and blade size 2 and 1/4 oz. Baitfish patterns and corresponding blade colors include: Brown Trout/Gold, Firetiger/Firetiger, Gold/Plated Gold, Minnow/Silver, Rainbow Trout/Silver, Silver/Plated Silver.

The Vibrax Double Spin’s twin blades run 2 to 4 feet and feature metal plated finishes. Includes the irresistible sonic vibrations that are the hallmark of the Classic Vibrax. Super-sharp dressed VMC hook adds like-like action and delivers quick, sure hooksets. The skirts are connected by a split ring allowing them to be interchangeable with other Vibrax Double Spin bodies. Includes proper size Siwash. Available in blade sizes 3 and 5 and the following colors (blades/body/tail): Copper/Copper/White, Gold/Gold/Brown, Silver/Chrome Purple/Chartreuse, and Silver/Silver/Black

The Classic Vibrax Foxtail spinner has all the benefits of the Classic Vibrax: the patented 2-part body, the irresistible low-frequency sound vibration and the premium quality materials like machined brass and super sharp VMC hooks. On top of that, we’ve added a calf tail mixed with shiny colored fibers to force fish to take notice. A stainless steel shaft, brass stamped blades and a wide variety of painted, printed and UV Bright finishes round out the package. Available in blades sizes 1 through 4 and weights of 1/8 oz., 3/16 oz., 1/4 oz. and 3/8 oz.

Classic Vibrax Glow spinners feature the same patented 2-part machined brass body that emits sonic vibration that is legendary for catching fish. Brass stamped blades with a painted tiger pattern and a calf tail and fiber hackle add interest. An ultra sharp VMC hook ensures hook-ups. Available in blade sizes 0 through 6. Glow-in-the-dark colors include: Glow Green, Glow Pink/Orange, Glow, Glow Blue, Glow Chartreuse, and Glow Orange.

The Vibrax Shallow features a patented two-part body that emits low-frequency sound vibrations that attract fish while virtually eliminating line twist. Diecast and chrome plated mainbody with laser holographic painted finishes and life-like eyes hold the attention of curious fish. A calf tail mixed with shining colored fibers helps lure in spooky fish and a premium VMC hook improves your hook up rates. Available in blades sizes 0, 1 and 2 and the following colors: Black Chartreuse, Blue Shad, Firetiger, Rainbow Trout, Shad and Shiner.

The Pixee Spoon’s premium brass construction provides the weight needed to get deep and stay deep, even in fast moving water. Special details like a hammered brass finish that reflects more light and an egg sac insert that adds a natural element to the offering make the Pixee Spoon stand out among its competitors. The Pixee is finished out with a premium VMC black nickel treble hooks and includes a properly sized siwash hook. Available in blade sizes 2, 3 and 4. Choose from UV, nickel plated, gold plated, painted and metallic finishes.

The Rattlin’ Pixee Spoon is constructed of premium brass with a heavy weight ideal for long casts and getting deep, even in fast water. A hammered finish creates facets that reflect more light and enhances flash. A Rattlin’ Egg-Sac Insert delivers both sight and sound attraction that mimics natural noises and drives fish wild. Each spoon comes with a super sharp VMC hook for excellent penetration and a properly sized siwash. Available in blade sizes 3 and 4. Choose from UV, nickel plated, gold plated, painted and metallic finishes

Start your collection with the Classic Vibrax fishing spinner, a lure that’s been perfected over time and a go-to for many spinner enthusiasts. Add some attraction with the Vibrax Foxtail, Glow or Double Spin. Target fast currents or deeper water with the Vibrax Bullet and Bullet Fly. Dominate skinny water with the Vibrax Shallow or go after that trophy catch with the Super Bou Spinnerbait. Throw out the Minnow Spin for a classic minnow profile and tight action that drive fish crazy. If you like to consistently catch fish, tie on any one of these Blue Fox fishing spinners and hang on.

Blue Fox spoon lures are tried and true, with proven patterns. These time-honored fish catchers have long been the favorite throughout the world for consistent success when fishing all species. Elements like premium brass construction, a variety of high quality finishes and Black Nickel VMC hooks set Blue Fox spoon lures apart from other competitors. Enhancements like an egg-sac insert and a hammered finish for extra flash drive fish wild. The Pixee Spoon has 3 blade sizes and more than 15 colors to choose from. The Rattlin’ Pixee Spoon comes in 2 blade sizes and more than 15 colors. The Strobe Tear Drop Spoon is available in 2 blade sizes and 7 color patterns.

The Strobe Tear Drop Spoon is the perfect weight for long casts. It has an enticing, fluttering retrieve that fish can’t help but chase. Super sharp and tough VMC hooks ensure that those that take a bite don’t shake loose. Proven patterns deliver every time and provide enough variety to cover any conditions. Available in blade sizes 1, 2 and 3 and the following colors: Firetiger, Five of Diamonds, Hammered Brass, Hammered Silver, Hammered Brass/Fire Stripe, Hammered Nickel/Blue Stripe and Red/White.

The marabou and flashabou body materials of the Super Bou create an enticing, life-like pulsating action on the water, with a flash that fish can’t miss. The twin Colorado blades create a hard thumping action. The classic safety pin design allows the bait to pull through thick cover and heavy-duty stainless steel construction promises durability cast after cast. Fish it low and slow or with a fast retrieve for a shallower presentation. Also flutters on the drop. Available in blade size 8 and the following colors: Black, Black Orange, Blue White, Brown Orange, Firetiger, Pink Purple, White Red, and Yellow Brown.

The Larvae, like all Trigger X baits, relies on the proven ACT formula for success: Action, Color and Taste. It’s a combination that ensures that fish will bite and hold on tight. When the water is ultra clear, fishing pressure is intense, or fish are just in a funk, tie on a Trigger X Larvae. Trigger X Larvae are available in several sizes to pair with any VMC jig. It also comes pre-rigged on VMC larvae jigs. Available in 9 fish catching colors, including 3 Ultra Glow pigments which hold a charge for up to 15 minutes.

slot-configuration.description: VIP - Free Ship and Tool Combo @ $199

html.body: Take our innovative Charge ‘N Glow Series. For ages, fisherman have been relying on borrowed light sources to charge their glow lures, like camera flashers and LED keychains. With the Charge ‘N Glow, simply pop glow hard baits, soft baits, spoons and jigs in the case, push the button and that’s it! Our other lighting options are built with the fisherman in mind too, like cap lights with dual mode lighting for in-boat and long-range lighting and the Mini Headlamp with interchangeable headstrap and cap mount. Pre-dawn on the lake or after sunset on the shore, see more clearly with Rapala lighting.

Just some of the tools we have that you might be on the hunt for: Fisherman’s Gloves, Line Remover, Fish Counters, Hook Files, Hook Sharpeners, Hook Removers and Battery Aerator. Need to store your rods? Check out our Lock ‘N Hold Rod Rack. Need a better way to store all your tools? You’ll love our Magnetic Tool Holders, which come with screws or high-strength bonding tape for mounting in your boat, fish house, shop or any flat surface. In short—if you need it, we got it.

Cut wire leaders and freshwater hooks with our 4” Mini Side Cutter or size up to the 7” Side Cutter to tackle heavy leaders and hooks. Effortlessly cut through braided line with the Super Line Scissors or EZ Stow Line Scissor or use our Fishing Clippers to clean up tag ends on knots. Leaders, hooks, lines, even that thread hanging off the brim of your hat—if it needs to be cut, Rapala’s got the tool for the job.

For the ultimate in functionality and performance, our Fish Gripper Scale Series can’t be beat. Available in either Mechanical or Digital models, both offer easy one-handed operation to safely lift, weigh and release fish. We also have a variety of digital fish scales for 15, 25 and 50 pounds, most in a compact size perfect for storage in boat glovebox or tacklebox. Touch Screen Scales are also available, with a 15 LB. Tournament Model for the competitive angler.

Remove the maximum amount of slush with a minimum amount of effort with our Mega Scoop. 34” handle means no bending down to use and the fold-in basket makes this tool portable and perfect for ice trolling. Charge your glow baits with our pocket-sized Mini Charge ‘N Glow or the Charge ‘N Glow Rod Mount. Be prepared with our Ice Safety Spike and Folding Pack Shovel. And don't forget to check out our other ice brands for your fishing needs - StrikeMaster (augers and accessories), MarCum (sonar and camera) and Otter (sleds, shelters and accessories).

A popular set is our Clipper Combo, with “use ‘em all the time” tools ready for action on neck lanyard and large split ring. Includes Clipper Combo, Hook File and Jig Buster. If you’re in need of a fillet knife, try our combo pack with 6-1/2” Pliers, Falcon Fillet Knife and Fishing Clippers. If pliers, cutters or scissors are missing from your collection, we have several combos with various sizes of each to choose from. The Pro Angler Kit, with a complete set of must-have tools, is an excellent gift for the beginning angler.

When the thermometer dips below zero, the 3M Thinsulate® insulation in our Ice Force Insulated bib will lock in warmth. Additional padding in the knees provides comfort when kneeling and reeling. The StrikeMaster Polar Bibs feature heavy-duty 300-denier nylon and will provide years of protection and functionality at a great price. Ladies cut ice fishing bibs are available as well. Keep the cold out, lock the heat in and stay on the ice longer in a pair of Rapala ice fishing bibs

With fishing, a lot of it comes down to luck, but a lot comes down to the right tackle. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for spring bass fishing. Try these and you’ll be catching fish faster than you can say “spring fever”.

We’ve got fish grippers, scales, rulers, pliers and more to help you fill the gaps in your fishing gear. Never guesstimate the size and weight, struggle to remove a hook or lose a catch overboard again!

Catching these monsters is no easy task, though. Notoriously difficult, the muskie has been called “the fish of ten thousand casts”. And finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for muskie and pike. From spinnerbaits to a variety of shad and minnow lures, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

But even with these obliging fish, finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for panfish. From ultralight crankbaits to spoons and plastics, we’ve got the best tackle to help you load up your stringer with panfish.

Catching big trout and kokanee takes a little know-how. And finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for trout and kokanee. From lake trolls to spoons and crankbaits, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

For dead of winter protection, choose the Polar Parka with 240 grams of polar fleece that works with your natural body heat to keep you warm. For the ultimate in safety, opt for the ELI Jacket. The ELI is loaded with safety features such as flotation buoyancy assistance, throwing rope and emergency light stick locators. If versatility is your key need, our Uninsulated Polar Parka is ideal. This jacket gives you more control over the thermal properties of the garment, adding more layers when it’s frostbite cold or stripping down to a tee-shirt underneath during late ice when the sun is high and warm. As a bonus, the Uninsulated Polar Parka doubles as waterproof and windproof raingear.

Rapala Knives Fit the Bill

Whether you’re headed to water or woods this fall for fins, fur or feathers, be sure to pack a Rapala fillet knife.

READ MORE

7-Strand Titanium Lightweight Leaders come pre-rigged with top of the line Touch-Lok snaps, ball bearing swivels, stainless steel crimps and welded rings. Each component is built for premium performance giving anglers a leader that stands the test of time. Packaged in a protective sleeve to prevent wear and tear. 7-Strand Titanium Leaders are available in 6” and 12” lengths and 15 and 30 lb test.

Multi-Strand Titanium Leaders come pre-rigged with top of the line Touch-Lok snaps, ball bearing swivels, stainless steel crimps and welded rings. Each component is built for premium performance giving anglers a leader that stands the test of time. Packaged in a protective sleeve to prevent wear and tear. 6” length available in 50 and 75 lb test. 12” length available in 50, 75 and 100 lb test and 24” length available in 75 lb test.

The Original Titanium Buzzbait has it all. A titanium frame, wings cupped greater than 90° for an enormous splash and a tuned rivet for extra sound. An upturned nose so that it can walk over logs and vegetation and rise to the surface quickly. Painted, gold or nickel plated exclusive serrated blades for extra flash. A long shank hook for increased hook-ups. If bass aren’t leaping out of the water for this baby, there just aren’t any fish in that fishing hole. Available in 3/8-oz and 1/2-oz and the following colors: Bright White Shad (nickel blade), Chartreuse White Shad (gold blade), and Black/Blue (black blade)./p>

The stainless steel frame of this umbrella rig can be adjusted into multiple configurations. This versatility allows anglers to simulate a variety of baitfish schools. A black nickel finish masks the wire visibility and a long center arm imitates a lagging baitfish—all special features that make the Stainless Steel Rig a fish-catching machine. Top shelf components like a rugged coupler minnow head, premium snaps and 75 lb. barrel swivels ensure performance over the long haul. Available in 3/8-oz and a body length of 5” and 1/2-oz in either 8” or 10” body length.

The Super Stainless spinnerbaits feature an exclusive beveled edge blade design that creates more flash and commotion. Choose from painted, gold or nickel plated blades. A QuickSkirt provides extra enticement and can be easily changed to match the conditions. A top of the line ball bearing swivel and VMC hook complete the package. Available in 1/4-oz., 3/8-oz., and1/2-oz sizes and a variety of patterns including Bright White Shad, Chartreuse White Shad, Sharp Chartreuse, Sliver Shad, Black Red Flake, Blue Shad, Clown and Hot Tip Chartreuse.

The Super Stainless Buzzbait features a flat head design that gets it on top of the water quickly, like a water ski. It’ll stay on the surface even at slow retrieve speeds. Painted, gold or nickel plated blades add flash and vibration to entice fish and a premium VMC hook keeps fish secured on the end of your line. A QuickSkirt changeable premium silicone skirt allows anglers to easily make adjustments to match the fishing conditions. Available in 3/8-oz and 1/2-oz and the following colors: Bright White Shad (nickel blade), Chartreuse White Shad (gold blade), and Black/Blue (black blade).

The T-1 Original Titanium Spinnerbait has a patented SnapBack Titanium wire frame that “snaps back” to its original shape for the truest-running, longest lasting spinnerbait available. Exclusive beveled edge blades create more flash and vibration in the water, and are available painted, gold or nickel plated. A QuickSkirt changeable premium silicone skirt makes changing skirts on the fly a breeze. Premium ball bearing swivel and VMC hook round out this fish catching machine. Available in 1/4-oz., 3/8-oz., and1/2-oz sizes and a variety of patterns including Bright White Shad, Chartreuse White Shad, Sharp Chartreuse, Sliver Shad, Black Red Flake, Blue Shad, Clown and Hot Tip Chartreuse.

slot-configuration.description: T-1 Original Titanium Spinnerbaits with Power Pulse QuickSkirtsTerminator

html.body: Each bait features the titanium frames, premium components and terminal that have made the T-1 series legendary, with the addition of the sexiest skirt on the market. The Power Pulse Quickskirt features a two-tier skirt design. The short skirt pulses with the retrieve cadence, while the longer strands flow with the water. It’s an irresistible combination for bass and pike. The Power Pulse Quickskirts are designed for easy changing to match the conditions and are available in a variety of forage based and attractor patterns.

The Tandem Buzz creates a commotion like no other buzzbait out there. Twice the noise and bubbles, plus twice the resistance on the end of your line allows for a slower retrieve. The Super Stainless frame is 30% more bend-resistant, so it can stand up to crushing strikes. Gold, counter-rotating blades add flash and ensure the Tandem Buzz runs straight and true. A QuickSkirt changeable premium silicone skirt lets anglers change colors on the fly to match the conditions. Available in 3/8-oz and 1/2-oz and Bright White Shad (with nickel blades), Chartreuse White Shad (gold blades) and Sharp Chartreuse (gold blades)./p>

The patented SnapBack Titanium wire frame of the Titanium Rig provides a long-lasting, non-breaking, consistently shaped spread. No re-bending is needed to maintain its form. Premium snaps and 75 lb. barrel swivels add to the durability of this rig. A long center arm imitates a lagging baitfish and a black nickel finish helps hide the wire, fooling many a predator into taking a bite. Collapses for easy storage. Available in 1/2-oz weight with a 10” body length.

The Titanium Twin Spin boasts our patented SnapBack Titanium frame. Virtually indestructible, this frame takes a licking and keeps on ticking. It’ll outlast traditional spinnerbaits by far. Dual Oklahoma blades, go-to color patterns, a QuickSkirt changeable silicone skirt and premium VMC needle point hook put fish after fish on the line. Available in 1/2-oz. and 3/4-oz. sizes and a variety of natural forage patterns including Blue Olive, Brown Purple, Perch, Silver Shiner and Sunfish.

With a little extra time and attention, bass fishing in winter can be as productive as other seasons. The key is the right tackle. But finding the right setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. Especially when you take into account the different requirements of each season. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures and rigs for cold water bass fishing. From crankbaits to jigs, hooks and fishing line, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

The key to finding and landing big gamefish is the right tackle. But identifying the winning setup can be a time consuming game of trial and error. We’ve gone ahead and taken the guesswork out of it for you. We asked our Pro staff to give us their top picks for the best lures, rigs and tools for saltwater fishing. From trolling lures and speed jigs to circle hooks and saltwater fillet knives, we’ve got the best tackle to help you land that great catch.

The Curl Tail Minnow features a long and micro-thin tail that swims with a light and subtle vibration that triggers strikes. The Panfish Minnow’s long, slender tapered design with unique webbed tail offers superb action with the slightest motion from the angler. The Boot Tail Minnow has the classic minnow profile plus a tail that wobbles and wiggles to the tune of a wounded or struggling baitfish. All minnows are available in a variety of natural, fluorescent, solid or top-to-bottom dual colors and long-lasting Ultra-Glow models.

The Trigger X Nymph is built on the ACT formula that makes all Trigger X soft baits so successful. It’s a finely tuned combination of Action, Color and Taste that ensures that fish bite and hold on tight. The tubular body of the Nymph is easy to rig and life-like appendages undulate to attract predators. Available in a wide variety of vibrant solid and top-to-bottom dual colors. Ultra Glow models hold a charge for up to 15 minutes, which means more time underwater and less time out.

The Wax Tail, like all Trigger X baits, relies on the proven ACT formula for success: Action, Color and Taste. It’s a combination that ensures that fish will bite and hold on tight. In addition, this bait delivers incredible action with little effort from the angler, while a ridged body offers life-like texture. If you need to make a quick switch to match changing conditions, just pinch off the tail and fish it like a waxworm. The Wax Tail comes in two sizes to pair perfectly with multiple jig sizes, and is also available pre-rigged on VMC Wax Tail Jigs. Available in a variety of proven colors, including long-lasting Ultra Glow pigments.

With Williamson’s Crimping Tool Combo, get everything you need to make professional rigs. Store lures safely and easily in the Roll Up Lure Bag and use the Lightweight Travel Rod Belt for jigging, spinning and popping when traveling. Land that monster fish with the Fighting Shoulder Harness and protect hands when wiring a large fish with our Wireman Gloves. Specialized tools for specialized tasks, all built for top performance.
