html.body:
ICE FORCE™ Blog

Get the scoop on the latest gear.

READ ON

Shadow Rap® 2016

A minnow in trouble makes dangerous moves. Struggling, it lunges in jerking motions, then it falls slowly with a quivering fade … just like the Shadow Rap.

SEE THE ACTION

Luhr-Jensen fishing and trolling accessories are smart gadgets and tools that can help make a good day fishing great. Includes lure enhancements like Fish Scale Tape, Luhr-Tape and swivel chains; and rigging items like Kwikfish Stretchy Thread, 3-Way Swivel, Duo-Lock Snaps and the Bouncing Betty sinker. Trolling accessories include a variety of divers, planers, snubbers, dodgers and lake trolls. There are many more – browse each subcategory to see all of our offerings!

Luhr-Jensen fishing accessories include lure enhancements like Fish Scale Tape and Luhr-Tape, which add flash to lure bodies. Rigging essentials include the Abe & Al 3-Way Swivel, Duo-Lock Snaps, Swivel Chains and the Bouncing Betty sinker. Use our Kwikfish Stretchy Thread to securely attach bait to lure bodies and the Power Flash to charge glow-in-the-dark lures. Sharpen hooks with the Hook File and keep them organized and protected with handy Hook Bonnets. Find a stringer, trolling spreader and other trolling tools here too.

The Hot Lips Express is a deep diving crankbait with a loud rattle that stays in the strike zone for the bulk of your retrieve. Hot Lips Troller is specially made for trolling, with a less severe dive angle. Use the Speed Trap to cover water quickly and effectively. A great search bait. The Kwikfish is legendary for its aggressive, wide side-to-side action that generates savage strikes from small trout to huge king salmon. Extreme and Lighted Versions also available. The Hot Shot is your river back trolling specialist and a staple of steelhead, trout and salmon anglers. The J-Plug features a free-moving swivel chain-to-hook harness that provides and unmatched darting, erratic minnow action.

80 years of experience and a deep understanding of how to motivate fish to strike have resulted in some of the most beloved lures available today. Each category holds time-tested, angler approved lures that are guaranteed to land you fish. Luhr-Jensen hard baits include winners like Hot Lips, Kwikfish and J-Plug. Can’t-live-without spinners include the Bang Tail, Coho Bolo, Hydro Vibe Hoochie and Shyster. Fill your tackle box with classic fish-producing spoons like the Krocodile, Needlefish and Cast Champ. The passion that Luhr-Jensen has for fishing is evident in the craftsmanship of its lures. It’s evident to anglers too, who’ve made Luhr-Jensen lures a worldwide success.

The Hydro Vibe Extreme spinnerbait’s vented blade requires less pulling speed for blade rotation. An excellent slow speed trolling spinner. The Hydro Vibe Hoochie features an acrylic bullet head, tinsel and vinyl combo skirt. The Coho Bolo is a trolling and casting spinnerbait with a squid body that Coho Salmon chase down with reckless abandon. The Bang Tail features a swivel to eliminate line twist and instant spin blades. Can be fished upstream as well as crosscurrent and downstream in rivers. The Tee Spoon is a salmon trolling spinner that is unique in its ability to fish well under a wide range of troll speeds. The Shyster is truly a no line-twist spinnerbait. Balanced to fish well in still water and streams alike. The Rogue Bait Rig is a tandem hook anchovy actionizer; Eric’s Prawn Rig is a 2-hook prawn actionizer./p>

If you’ll be out casting, Luhr-Jensen has a bevy of fishing spoons to choose from. The Hus-Lure and Cast Champ both have excellent casting performance and work on a variety of species. Tony’s Spoon is the ideal choice for shallow, grassy flats. The Krocodile and Crippled Herring are super versatile, super productive fishing spoons that work great casting or trolling. The Super Duper can also be cast or trolled, and excels at catching trout, Kokanee and panfish. If trolling is your game and versatility is your goal, the Reflecto Spoon is a must. The Coyote, Kokanee King, Needlefish and Jensen Flash Fly are all excellent salmon trolling spoons. For reefs, saltwater structure or peacock bass, opt for the Pet Spoon.

Luhr-Jensen trolling divers and planers are so popular, anglers know each one by name: Dipsy Diver, Jet Diver, Deep Six, Pink Lady, Hot Shot. You’ll find them all here, in a variety of sizes and fish attracting colors to suit your needs. If you’ll be trolling with braided or wire lines, trolling gear like snubbers are a must. Choose from the Great Lakes Snubber, Salmon Bungee, Trout Snubber or Dipsy Diver Snubber. Add extra enticement to your lures and baits with our wide variety of flashers and dodgers, and take a look at our deep selection of lake trolls to find the perfect one for your next fishing adventure.

Storm’s Kickin’ Series includes the most popular baitfish: Minnow, Shad, Slab and Goby. The Kickin’ Minnow is available in 4”, 6”, 8” and 10” and a variety of realistic and flashy color patterns. The Live Kickin’ Minnow features an ultra realistic shape and natural color patterns like Chub and Rainbow Trout. The Live Kickin’ Shad comes in 3”, 4”, 5” and 6” and 14 different color patterns. The Kickin’ Slab is available in 4” only. Choose from Black Crappie, Bluegill, Goldfish and Pearl colors. Last, but not least, is the Kickin’ Goby which features a single hook on its make for snag-free presentation close to the bottom.

Storm’s Rattle Jigging Craw is made of a soft yet strong plastic material and includes a rattle chamber that’ll have bass thinking they hear the clicking of crawdad legs on the rocks. If the realistic shape and rattle don’t bring ‘em in, the aniseed scent of this lure is sure to, and the wide gap VMC needle point hook will finish the job. The 3” Rattle Jigging Craw is available in Brown, Green, Green Pumpkin Gold Flake, Pumpkin Seed and Sand Orange Claws.

Storm soft baits offer an enormous variety of every forage type you can imagine, from bluegills, to eel and crawdads. Our WildEye Live series is the most realistic series of baits available. Internally weighted bodies create an incredibly life-like swimming action. The realistic color patterns and shapes of these baits are backed up with 3D holographic WildEye, holographic swimmin’ flash foil and a tough, yet soft outer body. Features over 20 bait species for both freshwater and saltwater. The Kickin’ series features a segmented body with a kicking tail and a polycarbonate lip that create the most action possible for a swimming bait.

The Storm Swim ‘N Eel lure features a large weighted diving/swimming lip that gives off a wide wobble action and gets the lure down below the surface where it needs to be. Two back hooks and through wire construction make the Swim ‘N Eel tough enough for big fighters. Available in 10-1/2” and 13-1/2” and Black or Natural colors. 2 eel lures per pack.

The WildEye Live saltwater series includes a vast selection of saltwater bait including anchovy, shrimp, mackerel, mullet, sand eel, herring, sardine and p’nut bunker. Wherever you are and whatever you’re targeting, there’s a WildEye Live lure to fit the bill. Each lure features an internally weighted body for ideal swimming action and VMC needle point hooks for fast, sure hooksets. These babies are so realistic, they’ll fool even the most finicky fish. A must-have for any saltwater angler’s arsenal.

The WildEye Live freshwater series includes a vast selection of freshwater bait from Redear to Brook Trout. Wherever you are and whatever you’re targeting, there’s a WildEye Live lure to fit the bill. Each lure features an internally weighted body for ideal swimming action and Black Nickel VMC hooks for fast, sure hooksets. These babies are so realistic, they’ll fool even the most finicky fish. A must-have for any angler’s tacklebox.

Sufix Wind-On Monofilament Leaders are made of premium quality, small diameter monofilament leader material. These leaders are easy handling, with low memory for improved casting. Exceptional knot strength and extreme durability make the Wind-On Leader ideal for a variety of uses including big game fishing, jigging and trolling. Available in 20 lb. test up to 500 lb. test.

Sufix Wind-On 100% Fluorocarbon Leaders feature superior abrasion resistance, to stand the test of time. These leaders are super strong and have exceptional shock absorption so fish won’t break the line or tear free of the hook. Fluorocarbon is impervious to damage from ultraviolet (UV) rays, so fish ‘em all year long in full sun without worry. Available in 20 lb. test up to 400 lb. test.

Each spoon features a large holographic eye and comes in three UV Bright Ultra Glow colors, four Ultra Glow patterns and four natural patterns. All Ultra Glow patterns will hold a charge for up to 15 minutes for more time underwater and less time out. When feeding action is confined to a narrow bite window and you need to get down to the action quickly, check out VMC’s Flash Champ Spoon. The Tingler Spoon’s wide fluttering, wounded baitfish action flutters on the fall out to the side so you can cover a wider column of water and get into previously unfished territory. When the fish are finicky, tie on the Tumbler Spoon. The Tumbler’s unique knuckle bend imparts a tumbling action that fish can’t resist. Crank up the volume and entice fish through sound with VMC’s Rattle Spoon.

Whether you’re fishing a dropshot presentation, a carolina rig, or flipping heavy cover, VMC has a bass hook perfect for your fishing situation and style. To eliminate line twist, take a look at the PowerShot, SpinDrift or SpinShot. If you like to throw a worm, VMC has a variety of hooks designed especially for use with worms, including heavy duty and extra wide gap versions. Wacky Weedless, Weighted Swimbait, Flippin’ and many more hooks are also available.

If you’re going after big fish requiring big bait and really big lines, VMC has 6X strong heavy-duty circle hooks with an extra large eye to accommodate heavy mono and wire leaders. The Tournament Circle Hook 6X has no offset point for fish conservation. Tournament Circle Hook 3X also available. The SureSet Circle Hook is perfect for rigging live bait in both fresh and saltwater and can withstand even the strongest braided lines. The Sport Circle Hook features a bend out eye for those who like to snell their hooks. The Wide Gap Tournament Circle Hook offers the widest gap of any tournament approved circle hook.

VMC fishing jigs are loaded with innovative features that make them stand out from other competitors. Lets start with the hooks—super sharp, made of premium materials and backed by 100 years of hook making experience. Then add in smart details like keeper barbs to hold plastics in place, weedguards, wide gaps to accommodate a wider variety of baits and offset hooks to improve hook up ratios. Throw in an immense variety to choose from, and you’ve hit the fishing jig jackpot. From classics like the Marabou Jig to new innovations like the Stand-Up Shaky Head Jig, with VMC you’re guaranteed to put more fish in the boat.

VMC has over 25 jigs to choose from. All the classics are here, like the Marabou Jig, Nymph Jig, and Wacky Weedless Jig. New innovations abound as well, like our Stand Up Shaky Head Jig with a flat head that rocks on the bottom and the Swinging Rugby Jig with a free-swinging jig head for more natural movement on the retrieve. VMC offers several jigs pre-rigged with premium TriggerX soft baits, which attract fish and maximize taste and texture. Some of these include the Wax Tail Jig, Minnow Jig, Waxy Jig, and Curl Tail Jig. Many jigs feature enhancements like 3D holographic eyes, UV and glow finishes and a wide choice of classic color patterns.

VMC has a variety of ready to fish rigs so you can pick your poison. Steelhead Rigs feature VMC premium black nickel Octopus hooks and 72” of premium mono. Our Halibut rig includes a saltwater resistant Perma Steel circle hook with 19” of 300 lb. monofilament and fluorescent protective tubing. The Revolution Hex Spinner Rigs feature our unique Hydro Flow vented blade, which generates increased vibration while providing true-running action at any speed. This is paired with a crystal clear Sufix fluorocarbon leader and triple barbed Fastgrip hook. VMC’s Fastgrip Live Bait Fishing Rigs deliver maximum versatility and tournament-grade performance for serious freshwater anglers. With color matching glow beads, triple barbed Fastgrip hooks and 72” Sufix fluorocarbon.

The Flash Champ is an ideal presentation for the ice angler on the move or any time the feeding action is restricted to a narrow bite window. Comes in four sizes, three UV Bright patterns, four Ultra Glow patterns and four natural baitfish patterns. Ultra Glow pigments hold a charge for up to 15 minutes, ensuring the angler every advantage to put more fish in the boat or on the ice. Features a 90 degree hook eye to keep the bait at the perfect strike angle and VMC’s unique power gap, which increases hooking percentage.

VMC offers hook kits for a variety of applications, including saltwater, crappie, panfish and crankbait. The Saltwater Bay Fishing Kit includes 38 shiner and live bait hooks ideal for East Coast and Gulf of Mexico fishing. The Crappie Fishing Kit features 60 extra long shank gold and bronze Aberdeen hooks, in every size you’ll need for catching crappies. The Panfish Kit gives you 63 extra long shank gold and bronze Aberdeen hooks plus assorted Baitholder hooks for targeting crappies, sunnies and other panfish. Get 43 long shank O’Shaugnessy live bait Perma Steel hooks in our Saltwater Live Bait Fishing Kit. Rehook your favorite crankbait lures with the Crankbait Repair Kit, including 28 1X strong round bend regular and short shank treble hooks, plus 20 split rings.

VMC fishing hooks are designed for one thing, and one thing only—increasing hookups. We help you put more fish in the boat with constant innovations, like our unique tempering process and our groundbreaking Spark Point technology. Then we team up with fishing pros to take proven, existing designs and make them even better. VMC has a fishing hook made expertly and precisely for every fishing scene, whether you’re hunting big game fish offshore or pulling out bass from the local pond; looking for a weedless hook for heavy cover or a circle hook for catch and release. Choose from All Purpose, Bass, Circle Hooks, Hook Kits, Live Bait, Saltwater and Treble. With the best materials, processes, designs and variety, VMC is your expert in hooks.

VMC’s Neon Moon Eye jig is an updated version of the traditional Aspirin-shaped head providing added control. 3D holographic eye adds realism. Our Hammerhead Jig includes a short-shank, Power Gap hook and a second line attachment point for rigging a quick strike trailer hook. UV kits feature the UV Bright Finish, which reflects more light energy, strengthening the lure’s visibility. Glow kits feature the Glow finish which holds a charge for 15 minutes.

VMC’s Wide Gap Walleye live bait hooks are made of Vanadium steel, which is up to 25% stronger than the material used in regular hooks. Offset, needle point and turned-up eye increase hooksets. The Fastgrip Octopus is the first hook to feature 3 microbarbs and 15% more penetration power than standard hook points. The perfect choice for live bait fishing for any fish that require instant, effortless point penetration. For versatility and a broad array of colors and sizes, live bait anglers choose the Octopus. Try the innovative Spindrift Hook for trolling, drifting, Carolina rigging and split shot rigging.

VMC’s Rattle Spoon performs well in low light and stained water conditions. Fish it hard and fast to bring the fish in. Once the fish appears in your sonar cone, slow down and shorten your jig strokes to let the rattle sounds seal the deal. Available in three sizes, three UV Bright patterns, four Ultra Glow patterns and four natural baitfish patterns. Couple the rattle with these highly attractive patterns and no fish can resist to bite! Also features a 90 degree hook eye to keep the bait at the perfect strike angle and VMC’s unique power gap, which increases hooking percentage.

VMC’s collection of Saltwater Hooks includes classics like the O’Shaugnessy Closed Eye and Wide Gap Hooks, great for a variety of applications. It also includes exciting new offerings like the Powershot Hook, which ensures freedom of movement and zero line twist for effective dropshot presentations. VMC’s exclusive Dynacut Point on the Dynacut Offsore and Dynacut Southern Tuna hooks, is the optimum hook for big game fishing. It features a unique design that allows the hook to easily penetrate the hardest part of the jaw in game fish such as Marling, Shark and giant Tuna. Our Pinhead hook is ideal for small bait like anchovies, with an ultra light weight for more natural presentation. Steelhead and Halibut rigs also available.

All VMC leaders feature welded rings, premium ball-bearing swivels and our exclusive Touch-Lok Snap. The Touch-Lok Snap allows for easy-on/easy-off lure replacement, but with exceptional locking strength to ensure that it won’t pop or pull open. Our leaders are strong, light, thin and virtually weedless. The Fluorocarbon leaders feature extra strong clear Sufix 100% fluorocarbon. Our Titanium leaders resist cutting, kinking and coiling and last longer. Each are available in a variety of weights and lengths.

All VMC weights are made of tungsten rather than lead. This means a smaller profile for fewer snags, an increased hardness for a better feel for structure and bites and a more environmentally friendly material. Rigs and fluorocarbon leader feature premium Sufix line. Switch-It tackle items like the Switch-It Slip Sinker and Switch-It Bottom Bouncer feature an easy-open snap connector that eliminates the need to cut and/or re-tie your rig. Pair your premium VMC hook with the best terminal tackle and get ready to haul in some fish!

VMC’s Lighted Slip Float features a water activated automatic turn on. It’ll run for 30 hours on just two coin batteries (included). It’s super bright, so you can’t miss it. Batteries are replaceable. Available in three sizes: Small (1/16 oz.), Medium (1/8 oz.) and Large (3/16 oz.).

VMC’s Texas Rig Kit includes everything you need for Texas riggin in heavy cover. The 30 piece kit features super sharp Vanadium steel hooks in black nickel and tin red, plus 1/8, 1 / 4 and 1 / 2 oz. matte black bullet sinkers. The Carolina Rig Kit is a 32 piece kit with Vanadium steel hooks, faceted red beads, barrel swivels and egg sinkers. Everything you need to get your line down, cover a lot of water and stir up some hungry bass. The Slip Float Rigging Kit features FastGrip hooks with 15% more penetrating power than ordinary hooks, red and white slip floats, lead split shot, bobber stops, and red knot beads.

VMC’s Quick Strike Trailer Hook is a top of the line version of the trailer hook rig. Features premium Sufix 12 lb. fluorocarbon leader and premium VMC high-carbon steel hook. “Fast-Snap” connector allows you to quickly and easily attach the trailer hook to your favorite jigheads. Designed to rig with the VMC Hammer Head jig. 3 trailer hooks per pack.

VMC tungsten fishing weights are totally lead-free, easy to peg and insert free. They feature an ultra-tough color coating. The Drop Shot Weights Ball and Cylinder feature an easy connect line pinch that allows the weight to release when snagged, loosing only the weight and not the complete rig. The Switch-It Slip Sinker is designed to make changing weights easy and eliminates the need to cut and/or re-tie your rig. Sinker Stops feature a high density neoprene stopper that pegs the weight close to the hook on a punch, flipping or pitching rig.

While most spoons cover only the water column directly under the hole you’re fishing, the Tingler flutters on the fall out to the side into previously unfished territory. Work the spoon back to your hole with short hops, giving fish a new look. This often results in violent strikes from big fish. The Tingler Spoon’s large Holographic Eye, wide variety of holographic attractor and Live baitfish patterns increase your odds of catching more fish! And just when you think it's time to re-charge rest assured the VMC Ultra Glow colors lasting up to 15 minutes means more time underwater and less time out.

VMC’s SureSet is an award-winning crankbait hook with one wide gap barb that turns short strikes into hookups. Features an inline eye that provides perfect balance and exceptional swimming action. Spark Point treble hooks feature VMC’s ground breaking Spark Point technology, which helps hook points retain their sharpness much longer than comparable hook points. Our Barbarian Treble’s Technical Locking Curve allows maximum transfer of energy toward the point when setting the hook for 25% improved hooking. Classic Round Bend and O’Shaugnessy trebles provide maximum variety and versatility.

The Tumbler Spoon has a slow tumbling action. Match the mood of the fish by working the spoon with slow twitches for a deadly rocking action or make longer jigging strokes to create a strike-producing flutter on the fall. Tip the Tumbler with a minnow head or larvae when the fish need extra coaxing. When fish are more active, fish it naked and let the amazing tumbling action and fish attracting flash do their thing. The Tumbler spoon is available in two sizes and a wide variety of UV colors, natural baitfish patterns, holographic finishes and ultra glow pigments that hold a charge for up to 15 minutes.

All of Rapala’s fish grippers are designed for one-handed operation and are corrosive resistant to stand up to the elements in both fresh and saltwater environments. A wrist lanyard ensures that only the fish goes back in the drink. If a simple gripper is all you need, opt for the Floating Fish Gripper. It’s constructed of non-corrosive, heavy duty plastic so that it floats – you’ll never lose it again! If a scale/gripper combo is on your list, take a look at the 50 lb. Mechanical Scale/Fish Gripper with a spring-loaded scale or the 50 lb. Digital Scale Fish Gripper with a large, easy-to-read digital display.

Terminator’s frog lures are exceptional topwater lures that look and act like the real thing. These lures let anglers get into the heaviest cover and gnarliest structure to go after the fish that no one else can get to. Included in the collection is the Walking Frog, featuring a rear-positioned weight and round rubber legs for an easy walk-the-dog and spit action. Available in both Camo and Leopard patterns in a variety of colors.

HOW2TV: Knots

Simple, step by step instructional videos on how to tie the most common knots in fishing.

Watch Here

Krocodile®

Krocodile® - Year in and year out, it proves itself to be the most productive spoon ever built. It can be cast and retrieved, jigged over structure, or trolled.

Shop Now

Rapala® Daily Catch

Rapala® Daily Catch –A free, one-touch, pro-fishing game where you compete against friends and anglers from around the world with exciting daily challenges and online tournaments for rewards. Available on iOS and Android smartphones and tablets.

Download the app

UV Bright Technology

UV Bright finishes reflect more light energy, strengthening the lure’s visibility. Our UV finishes are a unique combination of fluorescent paints, reflective surfaces and optical brighteners that make the lures more brilliant in any light.

Shop UV Bright

Performance Braid

Longest Casting, Easiest Handling Braid on the Market.

Shop Now

slot-configuration.description: How 2 TV: Fishing the Walking Frog

html.body:
Walking Frog

How 2 TV: Fishing the Walking Frog – Ott DeFoe teaches you when, where and how to fish the Walking Frog.

Watch Now

Coastal Black

Made specifically for saltwater with built up layers of ultra-thin black finish to withstand the harsh conditions of saltwater environment.

Shop Now

How2TV: Rigging

Mike Iaconelli shows you how to rig your favorite hooks and jig. Watch and Learn Here

Watch Now

Hard Baits

Our selection of saltwater lures are built to drive big gamefish crazy, with the strength and durability to finish the fight.

See The Selection

Metal Jigs

Metal Jigs are the hottest technique in saltwater fishing today. Whether vertical or horizontal jigging action – Williamson has just the right jigs you need to get you in the strike zone.

Shop Metal Jigs

Flap Tail Grub

Will “slap” fish into action with the flapping of its thin-profile beaver-style tail. It resembles a swimming leech as it moves through the water. Split the tail section to mimic the action of a wounded minnow.

Shop Flap Tail Grub

Nymph

Resembles the small aquatic insects that gamefish feed on year-round. A tubular body makes rigging it a breeze, while lifelike appendages flicker and flutter, enticing even wary fish to nab it.

Shop Nymph

Wingding

Featuring a solid-core soft body, wing-like appendages give the Wingding stability and a unique gliding action on the fall. Tentacles in the tail section pulse and swim for additional fish-enticing action.

Shop Wingding

Portable, Compact Underwater Viewing

With the power of underwater viewing now pocketsize in MarCum’s Recon 5 systems, it’s easier than ever to peek below the boat or ice to pick up clues about the presentations and cover fish prefer.

Shop Now

Share with Us

Connect and Share with us on Facebook and Instagram.

Share with Us

Arashi Vibe - Whomp

Get ready to change the way you fish. Once you throw a 360GT Coastal bait on your line, you'll never want to take it off. Whether using a jig head or a weighted hook, there's a 360GT coastal bait for every situation. With professionally designed "easy rigging" channels and perfectly matched rigging systems, you can expect natural presentation and premium quality in every package.

Don't waste your time tossing your wacky rig around the fish. Toss your bait right into the bass' living room with weedless wacky rigging. Imagine if a juicy marinated porterhouse steak on china just drifted onto your living room coffee table. It would at least grab your attention right? Thats what we're talking about here.

Take it from the pros, these products will catch big fish. If you find yourself searching for a new secret to fall bass, look no further. Whether it is the right line, special weights, or a new lure, you will find yourself reeling more hogs than every for with any of these pro picks.

Every bass angler has this specific summer bass fishing memory: a hazy summer morning, floating on mirror-smooth water with nothing but the sound of the lure plunking into the water. Suddenly, you feel the weight on the line, you set the hook and feel your heart race and sweat drip as you reel in your first lunker of the day. Summer can be a tough time to bass fish, but nothing beats catching bass with just a t-shirt, a rod and a little sweat on your brow.

Winter bass kickin your…butt? Don't fear. We don't want you to spend another minute freezing your face off without results. Though we can't do much about the "freezing your face off" part, we sure as heck know how to get results. Throw on any of these winter picks and you'll never have a dull moment in the cold again.

Whether you want to try out some new Sufix® line or you need a new "lucky jig," our best sellers will prove to be everything you were looking for and more. Don't take our word for it though, take it from the thousands of anglers who return to these products year after year.

Marttiini Collector’s Hunting Knives are especially impressive as treasured gifts or collector's knives. Each incorporates function with high-end aesthetic value. Many Marttiini Collector’s Hunting Knives have a story to tell: memories, history, traditions and celebrations. The Marttiini Special series includes anniversary and annual models that have limited production amount and availability.

High-quality steel construction ensures effortless cutting and an edge that stays sharp. Whether dicing an onion, or carving a fresh slice of pork tenderloin, these Martiini knives are the choice for you.

Don't waste your time fiddling around with fish in your hand or line on your lures. Check out our latest fishing tools instead. Designed to streamline the fishing experience, these quality fishing tools will not disappoint. These comfortable tools are designed by anglers for anglers for optimal effectiveness and durability.

First time anglers and experienced professionals alike recognize Rapala fillet knives as a premium quality fish filleting and cutting machines. Though we already have an extensive array of quality knives, our collection never stops growing. Check out the lastest our legendary knifemakers have to offer and you will surely be impressed.

Find the latest and greatest products all in one place. If you are looking to upgrade your fishing set up, this is the best place to come. Across our 12 brands, we consistently design the most effective fishing products in the world to help you enjoy your time on the water and catch more fish. Whether you are looking for a new lure for your favorite fishing spot, or new colors of your favorite crank, we've got you covered.

slot-configuration.description: Rapala Best Selling Ice Fishing Gear

html.body: If you're looking for some additions to add to your tacklebox that will be sure to amaze you, pick anything from this ice fishing best sellers list and you will not be disappointed. Take it from thousands of satisfied anglers, these products will keep you coming back for more every time.

slot-configuration.description: Rapala Best Selling Knives and Fillet Boards

html.body: No choice is a bad choice on the fillet knives and fillet boards best seller list. These products are made with the highest quality materials by people who know fishing, so they are sure to impress. Make filleting easy and convenient with these expertly designed products.

slot-configuration.description: Rapala Best Selling Lures Spoons, Spinners and Jigs

html.body: These products are the best-of-the-best and there is no wrong choice in this list. Fill your tacklebox with any of these best sellers and watch as fish start jumping in your boat eager to get at 'em. Tested and proven favorites of anglers, these lures, spoons, spinners and jigs will not disappoint.

Whether you are looking for a new "secret weapon" lure or the most handy tools on the market, these saltwater best sellers will surely fill the void. These are the favorites that get fish in the boat and get anglers hooked on Rapala® products.

Make your time on the water effortless with just the right tool for the job. Whether you are weighing your biggest hog yet, or pulling the hook out of an ambitious panfish, we've got the right tool for you. Rapala has your back anytime, anywhere, for every purpose.

We want you to focus on fishing, not on untangling all of your jigs. These deluxe products are designed by anglers for anglers, and they are made to last a lifetime. With our professional organization solutions, going through the tackle box will never be the same.

These accessories are ready-to-use and professionally designed, because nobody wants to waste time fiddling with a slippery fish and a dull knife. These must-have accessories will keep your knives tuned and your dinner guests happy.

Professional designers and unbelieveably creative innovators push the boundaries of what it means to fish here at Rapala. We pride ourselves in making lures that catch fish and products that never diappoint. It is as simple as that. Check out the latest from our lure geniuses and you will see the best new products in fishing technology.
Whether you are on or off the water, Rapala clothing is made for you. These functional and comfortable products will be with you from worst of conditions to the livingroom couch.
Our lures catch fish. It is as simple as that. With new designs and styles comes more fish in your boat, more stories, and more behemoths mounted on your wall.

The Rippin’ Rap® is perfect for pulling over or through grass, bouncing off timber and rippin’ through rocks. With long-casting ability and variable running depth, this lure is super easy to fish in any situation. Professional sound design and an enticing textured body ensure this one is the perfect choice in clear water where look is key or in stained, dark water where just the right sound is essential. Fast piercing VMC® black nickel hooks seal the deal.

If you are taking your rods traveling or keeping them in the garage at home, it is important to keep them protected from whatever is thrown their way. Don't let tangled or broken rods ruin your day again. Take a look at these professionally designed storage systems so you can keep your mind focused on how heavy your stringer will be instead of how to sort through a nest of rods.
Don't miss these unique Rapala products and special pricing. These discounts don't stick around long, so make sure you come back often to see if you can reel in any tuna sized deals!
Grab these smokin' deals before they burn up! Delivering the same great quality as all other Rapala products at a way lower price, these deals are a no-brainer!

Don't waste your time untangling your jigs or digging through your tools again. Keep your stuff safe and easily accessible so you can spend more time focusing on fishing and less time fiddling with your gear.
Don't waste your time looking for your tools around the boat again. Keep them in a convenient storage system and never worry about tripping over them when you are fighting your catch of the day.

With comfortable molded handles and high quality steel design, these balanced knives will work how you want them to for every function. These knives are professionally designed to withstand the abuse of aggressive fishing and provide premium quality performance for years.

Whether it's Rapala's classic rolling action, an aggressive Slashbait® action, or something in-between, X-Rap Saltwater lures won't let you down. With unlimited fishing possibilites, these lures are a clear hardbait choice for an irresistable bite all season long. These slab-catching machines feature premium VMC hooks so the fish stay on through the toughest of battles. Once you feel the true power of an X-Rap lure on your line, you'll be hooked for the rest of the season.
